input: Umugabo wanjye w’iserazerano aba Uganda, nkaba narabyaranye n’undi, uwo twabyaranye rero ni umuyobozi w’umudugudu wa kabuye.
Nk’uko abari mu nama babigaragaje, ngo byakunze kugaragara ko uko imijyi igenda ikura hari abantu bagenda bimurwa bakimukira mu nkengero zayo, naho bahagera, nyuma y’ikindi gihe bakongera kwimurwa.
Amakuru avuga ko yaba yihishe muri Kenya aho akomeje gukora ubucuruzi ni ubwo icyo gihugu kibihakana.
Ibyo babivuga bahereye ku kuba mu mwaka wa 2006 iyo ndwara yaragaragaye mu gihugu cya Uganda.

Umunyarwanda Michel Bagaragaza yahoze ari umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo cya OCIR- Ishami ry’icyayi, akaba yarafatwaga nk’umwe mu nkoramutima za Juvnal Habyarimana wari Perezida w’u Rwanda.

Nzabonimana, wize ibijyanye n’ubutaka muri kaminuza yo mu Bufaransa, ashinjwa kuba ari mu bateguye bagaashyira mu bikorwa, akanategeka ubwicanyi bw’Abatutsi, ndetse no kwica abataravugaga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwariho.
Urukiko rwemeje ko rufite ububasha bwo gukurikirana Umunyarwanda wese wakoreye icyaha hanze y’igihugu iyo gihanwa n’igihugu yagikoreyemo.

Mu itangazo yashyize ahagaragara, Andrew Nganga umuyobozi mukuru wa Thousand Hills Expeditions ahumuriza ba mukerarugendo, abashishikariza kuza mu Rwanda kuko hari amahoro n’umutekano.
Nyinshi muri zo zabaga mu gishanga cya Kageyo mu murenge wa Mwili mu karere ka Kayonza.

Hari igice kinini cya Parike kimaze kuzitirwa, birashoboka ko zashatse gusubira muri Parike zikabura aho zinjirira kubera urwo ruzitiro.

Bahizi yavuze ko aba bakora imirimo nsimburagifungo ifitiye igihugu akamaro bazajya bakora uyu muhanda bataha iwabo, bakazaba bawutsindagiye kuko batateganije ibikorwa byo kwimura abaturage kugira ngo bawagure.

Kugeza ubu, amahoteli agera kuri 11 ku mahoteli arenga 200 akorera mu Rwanda niyo yonyine asanzwe akoresha Expedia.
Icyo gikorwa kizaha amakuru abanyamahanga bifuza gusura u Rwanda ariko ntibabone amakuru ku byiza nyaburanga rufite.
Ibizami byakorewe umurambo w’iyo ngagi byerekanye ko iyo ngagi yapfuye ishonje bisobanuye ko yapfuye imaze iminsi itarya kubera ko yari yaguye mu mutego.
Abakozi b’iki kigo bakomeje urugendo bagana mu mirenge ihana imbibe n’ikiyaga cya Sake kugira ngo baganire ku buryo iki gishushanyo cyarushaho gukorwa neza.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa RDB, John Gara, yavuze ko kongera ibiciro bije mu gihe ingagi zirimo kwiyongera kandi hakaba hari n’abantu benshi bakomeje kwitabira kuzisura.
Ubuyobozi bwa parike y’Akagera burakeka ko izi nzovu zaba zarapfuye tariki 31122011, ariko bakavuga ko batabizi neza kuko amakuru nya yo azatangwa n’abo baganga b’inzobere boherejwe na RDB.
Urwo rutonde ruvuga ko The Manor, Lemigo, Mille Collines na Lake Kivu Serena ziri mu gice cy’amahoteli afite inyenyeri enye.
Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Rubavu, Sheih Bahame Hassan, asubanura ko impamvu nyamukuru yo kubaka kuri uyu musozi harimo gufata ubutaka ntibutwarwe n’isuri no kuhagira ahantu nyaburanga.
Majyambere Florent, uhagarariye Nyabihu Tourism, yavuze ko ibikoresho bahawe bizabafasha kumenya inyoni zikunze kuza mu gace barimo bitewe n’igihe runaka.
Eric Musanganya, ukuriye amashyirahamwe y’amahoteli mu Rwanda, yatangarije ikinyamakuru the East African ko uru rwego rukwiye kwisubiraho.
Ibi byatewe nuko nyuma ya Jenoside yo mu 1994 hari Abanyarwanda batahutse bagatura muri bimwe mu bice byari bigize parike.
aha bakaba batunga agatoki inzovu Mutware, uretse ko hari imvubu zituriye mu mariba y’inka nazo zibivugana bagiye kuhira amatungo.
Ukuriye ishami ry’ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Rica Rwigamba, yatangarije Reuters ko kuva mu kwa mbere kugeza mu kwa munani 2011, u Rwanda rwakiriye ba mukerarugendo basaga 593.

Ariane Nayituliki yegukanye umwanya wa kabiri igisonga cya mbere naho Liliane Umutoni yegukana umwanya wa gatatu igisonga cya kabiri.
Mutakwasuku yagize ati ubutore bwanyu ntibuzabe amasigaracyicaro kuko igihugu cyababyaye kirabakeneye.
Ikindi ngo iyo umugore atangiye kugenda ahindura imico bituma urukundo rugabanuka n’imibiri igahagana bigatuma umugabo ajya gushaka umunezero ahandi.
Ujya kumva umuntu arihanukiriye ngo abwiye undi ko ageze i Nyanza kandi ubwo ni bwo bakigera mu Ruhango bagana i Butare.
abafiyanse fiancs bagomba gufata ka avance kubera ko mugomba kumvana, mwakumva mudahuje mugafata ibyemezo amazi atararenga inkombe.

Gatayire Marie Claire, uyobora umuryango w’Abanyeshuri barangije kaminuza, yatubwiye ko ari igikorwa basanganwe cyo guhura nk’abahoze ari abanyamuryango ba AERG ubwo bari bakiri ku ntebe y’ishuli biga.
Iki kigo gifite uburambe mu kubika ubutumwa bw’amajwi, amashusho ndetse n’inyandiko ku birebana n’amateka ya Jenoside.
Dushyire hamwe dukunde umuco kuko niwo shingiro ry’amahoro.
Ngo aho aba asa n’uwambaye ubusa, kandi ng’ubundi mu muco nyarwanda, umunyarwandakazi agomba kwambara akikwiza.
Muri Jenoside yabuze abana be babiri ndetse na se ubabyara.
Kuri uwo munsi abatari bake bakoze urugendo bashishikariza abantu kugaragaza uruhare rwabo mu gushyigikira amahoro.

Mu kiganiro twagiranye kandi yatubwiye ko mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi n’ubusabane bigamije amahoro, basanze umuntu urangwa n’ubupfura hamwe n’ubworoherane ari we ugira uruhare mu kubaka amahoro kd akanayaharanira.
Uyu muhango watangijwe n’urugendo walk to remember rwatangiriye ku Nteko Ishingamategeko ya Canada rugera ku biro by’umujyi wa Ottawa ahabereye imihango yo kwibuka.
Abo bahanzi babanje gusura urwibutso rwa Ntarama aho basobanuriwe amateka yaho ndetse n’iyicwarubozo ryahabereye.
Kuba abanyamahanga baramaze igihe babona Umunyarwanda wese nk’umwicanyi, Abanyarwanda bose bakwiye gufatanya kwiyambura icyo gisebo barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside aho iva ikagera.
Avuga ko ihungabana riterwa na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ritagirwa gusa n’abacitse ku icumu kuko n’abandi bashobora kurigira kubera ibyo babonye, bakoze cyangwa bumvise muri icyo gihe cya Jenoside.
Umuyobozi w’akarere ka Nyamasheke, Habyarimana Jean Baptiste,Twe twamaze amezi atatu yose muri Jenoside kuko twari muri zone turquoise.
Avuga ko avuka mu muryango w’abantu 10 ariko niwe wenyine washoboye kurokoka.
Kugeza ubu ntibiramenyekana niba Rutayisire yaragejejwe imbere y’ubutabera, niba akiri mu buroko cyangwa niba yarafunguwe.
Uwase yagize ati bakimbona banze kwemera aho nari ndi, kandi ambulance yanzanye nanjye ntabizi ubwo se barabona nari kubwira muganga ngo mperekeza ungeze iwacu.
Umuyobozi uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Buhindi, Williams Nkurunziza, yavuze ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994 itazongera ukundi.
Ikindi yongeraho ni uko uwari Perezida w’u Rwanda, Juvenal Habyarimana ,akimara gupfa basabye abantu kuguma mu ngo banabizeza umutekano.
Ntiwishe kandi ntabwo wahigwaga ndetse wari ukuze ushobora gutanga ubuhamya ndetse ukabutanga neza kurusha bariya bana bari bafite imyaka itandatu muri Jenoside.
Uhagarariye abacitse ku icumu mu karere ka Burera, Niyonsenga Fabien, avuga ko abacitse ku icumu bo muri ako karere baharaniye kwiyubaka.
Yagize ati Icyo dukwiye gukora ni uguharanira ubumwe nk’uko Leta yacu ibidushishikariza, tukirinda ibidukandukanya ahubwo tugahuriza umugozi umwe dufasha abafite intege nke tukagera ku iterambere.
Twigire ku mateka turusheho kubaka ejo hazaza.
Nubwo hari byinshi byagezweho, abacitse ku icumu muri aka karere basabye ko bafashwa mu bijyanye n’ubuvuzi kuko hagenda hagaragara abacitse ku icumu bagihura n’ibikomere batewe na Jenoside.
Mu muhango wo gutangiza icyumweru cyo kwibuka ku nsuro ya 18 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu karere ka Nyamasheke, hakusanyije inkunga ingana n’ibihumbi 104, akaba yiyongereye kuyo bari basanganywe.
Munyaneza Jean Baptiste ukuriye ihuriro ry’Abarokotse Jenoside yagize ati Amahano ya Jenoside yabaye ndengakamere atwara abacu benshi.
Kabanda yasabye Abanyarubavu kwita kuri abo bana ndetse n’abapfakazi.
Nababwiraga ko mu mahirwe miliyoni na miliyoni, nta mahirwe bafitemo kugira ngo badusubize inyuma kuko bidashoboka.
Perezida wa IBUKA yagarutse ku kibazo cy’ihungabana asaba ko hashyirwaho uburyo buhoraho bwo kwita ku kibazo cy’ihungabana gikomeza kugaragara mu bacikacumu.
Ibyo bazifashisha harimo indirimbo bakoze n’abahanzi batoranyijwe mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru.
Nk’uko bigaragara kuri gahunda aka karere kihaye ku bijyanye no kwibuka, icyumweru cyahariwe kwibuka mu gihugu kizarangwa ahanini n’ibiganiro.
Kuri we, abibonamo ubushake bukeya bw’inzego z’ibanze mu kwishyuza imitungo y’abacitse ku icumu.
Yuma yo gusohoka muri Jenoside, u Rwanda rumaze gutera intambwe igaragara mu nzego zose haba mu buzima, mu burezi, mu buhinzi mu rwego rwo kuzamura iterambere ry’igihugu n’imiyoborere myiza.
Aba baturage bavuga ko bishimiye kubona amazu yabo bwite kuko ubuzima bwo kuba mu bukode butari buboroheye.

Abahawe inka basabwe kudakomeza gutegereza gahunda y’ingoboka ahubwo ko nabo bagomba kworora neza bakazagoboka bagenzi babo batishoboye nk’uko byatangajwe n’umuyobozi w’akarere wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza, Nyiraneza Clothilde.
Uwiringiyimana yibukije urubyiruko ko rudakwiye gufata igihe cyo kwibuka nk’igihe cyo kwiryamira cyangwa guhura n’incuti bitwaje ko bagiye ahabera igikorwa cyo kwibuka.

Nubwo ibihugu byinshi byo muri Afurika bihuriye mu muryango w’Afurika yunze ubumwe ubuhahirane hagati y’ibihugu ntibukomeye kandi hari ibyo ibihugu bishobora guhahirana.
Mu kiganiro aba banyonzi twagiranye, n’akababaro kenshi badutangarije ko uyu mwanzuro utabashimishije dore ko bamwe muri bo bamaze hafi imyaka ine bakorera kuri uyu muhanda.
Kevin Mukotanyi, ushinzwe ibikorwa bya Tigo i Rubavu, yatangaje ko gufungura aya amashami ari ukwegereza Abanyarubavu serivisi batajyaga babona nka telefoni, SIM swap, Tigo cash n’ibindi.
Umwe muri aba bacuruzi witwa Uwimana Jeanne, avuga ko aba yaranguye kugirango yunguke atunge umuryango we.
Bralirwa yongeraho ko ibindi binyobwa by’inzoga ikora byagiye bijyana n’impinduka z’ibiciro byifashishwa mu kubikora kuva mu mwaka wa 2008 ariko ibiciro bya fanta byo byari bitarahinduka.
Nkurunziza Jean Baptiste avuga ko impamvu abantu bamwe bajya mu bucuruzi bwa kanyanga ari ugushaka imibereho.
ku ngunguru imwe y’ ibigori nshobora kungukaho amafaranga 1000 nkishyura umusoro wa 400 ndetse n’inkwi za 500 ngasigarana 100 gusa.
Hari hashize hafi imyaka itanu South African Airways ihagaritse ingendo zayo mu Rwanda.
Girma wake agiye kuyobora Rwandair nyuma y’imyaka 37 akorera companyi y’indege ya Ethiopian Airlines 15 muri yo yari umuyobozi mukuru w’iyo companyi.
Yongeyeho ko RURA izagerageza guhura n’abashinzwe gutwara abantu barimo abafite ibinyabiziga kugira ngo barebe icyakorwa.
Abagenzi bavuga ko amafaranga yagabanijweho ari menshi ku buryo byaba byiza n’ibiciro by’ingendo bigabanijwe kuko ari byo byagirira akamaro abaturage benshi.
Rutikanga wo mu Murenge wa Gatunda mu Karere ka Nyagatare yagize ati Nk’inyama ni ukuzivaho, naho ubundi twazicwa n’inzara.
Minisitiri yavuze ko ibiciro byagabanutse kubera ko Leta yagabanyije imisoro yo ku bikomoka kuri peteroli guhera tariki 16 Mutarama 2012 mu Rwanda ariko no ku rwego mpuzamahanga byagabanutseho gato.

Imirwano yadutse mu duce twa Bunje, Brazza, Chambombo na Mpanama ubwo abarwanyi ba Raia Mutomboki bateraga bavuye gace ka Walikale muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru.
Iyo miryango ivuga ko ifite impungenge z’uko imirwano ishingiye ku moko igiye kubura muri ako gace, igasaba Leta ya Kongo kohereza vuba ingabo z’igihugu kugira ngo zicunge umutekano w’abenegihugu.
Kuwa mbere tariki 11062012 umunsi wose abahunga ibitero bya FDLR babarirwa mu miryango 600 bari buzuye mu mihanda y’i Minova nk’uko byatangajwe na Radio Okapi.
Ibyo byatumye abaturage bahunga ingo zabo berekeza mu gace ka Busurungi.

Umukuru w’abaturage bo mu ubwoko ba Waloa Loanda, umwami Kiroba Bulenezi atangaza ko umubare w’abahitanwe n’icyo gitero ushobora kwiyongera kuko abaturage bakomerekejwe cyane n’imihoro n’imbunda byakoreshejwe na FDLR.
Perezida wa sosiyete sivile muri Lubero avuga ko ababajwe n’uko ingabo za Kongo zitari muri ako gace, agasaba ko zongera kuhagaruka kugira ngo abaturage bagire umutekano n’ituze.
Ugiye kujyaho ku mpamvu z’umutekano no kurwanya amakimbirane mu karere kacu tukaba duhamagarira ibihugu byose kubigiramo uruhare.
Mu nkambi yabaturage bavanywe mu byabo yitwa Abushouk iri mu karere ka EL Fasher naho haratashywe ibyumba 10 byubatswe n’Ingabo z’u Rwanda zigize Batayo y’i 157.
Avuga ko bamaze kumukubita bamutaye ku nzira akaza gutoragurwa na Polisi ya Uganda, ikamujyana kwa muganga aho yapfiriye kuwa Gatatu ushize.
Ingabo za Leta ya Congo nazo zaje kugaba ibitero kuri izo nyeshyamba ari nabyo byatumye abaturage bava mu byabo.
Amakuru dukesha urubuga rwa polisi y’igihugu, avuga ko Umukuru wa Polisi y’igihugu IGP Emmanuel K.
Aba bagabo bavuga ko ibi abagore baba babiterwa no kudasobanukirwa neza gahunda y’uburinganire, aho bo baba bumva ko ari ukubashyira hejuru y’abagabo.
Mbusa Pengela ni umukozi w’umwe mu miryango itegamiye kuri Leta muri Kivu y’amajyaruguru.
Aba baturage bakaba bashinja ingabo z’igihugu cyabo ko zibatererana bikabije kuburyo babona ko nta muntu wita ku mutekano w’abaturage.
Nyuma yo guhangana n’icyo gitero cy’abantu batabashije kumenyekana, abasirikare babiri bo mu Ngabo z’u Rwanda barahaguye, hakomereka abandi bane.
Biragaragara ko Rayon Sport uyu mwaka ihagaze neza ariko kuba naragarutse muri APR, mbona nzafasha cyane mu gushaka intsinzi.

Twaganiriye n’inzobere mu bwubatsi bwa za Stade, batubwira ko kuvugurura Stade Amahoro hongerwa ubunini bwayo bigoye cyane ku buryo igihe n’amafaranga byatwara byenda kungana n’ibyagenda mu kubaka stade nshya.
Reka ikipe tube tuyirekeye abayifite cyane ko banaherutse gutsinda Benin ndetse binahe n’amahirwe abarimo kuyitoza ubu, dore ko bamwe ari n’aba kandida bashaka kuzatoza iyi kipe, nabo bigaragaze.
Twamuzanye tumushakaho intsinzi ariko siko byagenze, ikindi kandi wasangaga azana umwuka mubi mu ikipe, akanasuzugura abo bakorana.
Ayo makipe 10 azaba yasigaye azatomborana uko azahura abiri abiri hagati yayo mu mukino ubanza n’uwo kwishyura, amakipe atanu atsinze azabe ari yo yerekeza mu gikombe cy’isi muri Brazil.
Jean Marie Ntagwabira, umutoza wa Rayon sport avuga ko abonye Bokota na Mafisango byafasha iyi ikipe kuko bose azi ubuhanga bwabo.
Iyi mikino yabayemo gutungurana ku makipe amwe namwe aho nka Proline Academy ikomeye muri Uganda nayo yari yitabiriye iyi mikino iza kuvamo ku ikubitiro.
Ibi ikaba yabigezeho kuri icyi cyumweru ibikesha ibitego by’abasore bahagaze neza muri iyi minsi Olivier Karekezi kapiteni w’iyi kipe n’umunya Uganda Dan Wagaluka.
Bitwe n’uko icyi cyemezo cyatunguye amwe mu makipe azaturukamo aba bakinnyi byatumye Ferwafa itanga uburenganzira kuri aya makipe ngo bashake abakinnyi bo kuziba icyo cyuho.
Muri iri tsinda ryarimo andi makipe abiri u Burundi na Ivory Coast.
Muri iri tsinda ririmo andi makipe abiri u Burundi na Ivory Coast.
Mu guhatanira umwanya wa gatatu APR BBC yatsinze CSK amanota 84-60, naho mu rwego rw’abagore APR BBC ni yo yegukanye igikombe itsinze Kaminuza y’u Rwanda.
Undi mukino wa cy’irangiza ugomba guhuza APR BBC na Kigali Basketball Club KBC, aho ikipe itsinda izakina na Espoir BBC ku mukino wa nyuma.
Mutabazi yagize ati, Mu nama twakoze twagarutse cyane ku mategeko agenga abakinnyi b’abanyamahanga mu Rwanda.
Maroc yo yabashije gutsinda u Rwanda, inatsinda Gabon bituma yegukana umwanya wa 9, Gabon ifata umwanya wa 10 naho u Rwanda rufata uwa 11.
Nyuma yo kubona iyo tike, iyi kipe yahise isubira mu mwiherero kuva tariki 2672012 nk’uko byanifujwe n’Ubuyobozi bw’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Basketball mu Rwanda FERWABA.
Ikipe y’u Rwanda yagaragaje ubuhanga n’imbaraga, yashimishije abafana bayo bari benshi, maze agace ka mbere k’umukino karangira ku manota 20 kuri 11 ya Kenya.
Iyi mikino igamije gushaka itike yo kuzajya mu mikino y’igikombe cya Afurika cy’abatarengeje imyaka 18 kizabera muri Mozambique mu bahungu no muri Senegal mu bakobwa.
Aya makipe azongera akine imikino ya kabiri ku Cyumweru tariki 22072012, saa Munani mu bakobwa na saa Kumi mu bahungu.
Yagize ati iyi mikino ya gicuti ifasha abakinnyi cyane kumenyera no gukomera kandi natwe nk’abatoza bikadufasha kumenya aho tugomba gukosora.
Abandi bakinnyi bose bakinnye imikino ya nyuma y’igikombe cy’Amahoro bari bategerejwe, nka Kipson Atuheire wo muri APR FC, Jean D’Amour wo muri Police FC bamaze gusanga abandi i Rubavu.
Shema yagize ati Urebye ukuntu Jonathan yakinaga kandi akiri muto cyane, wabonaga azagera ku rwego rushimishije.
Muri iyi mikino yitabiriwe n’amakipe yo mu Burundi, RDC n’u Rwanda, amakipe yose yagombaga guhura hagati yayo, hakarebwa amakipe abiri ya mbere agakina umukino wa nyuma.
Abakobwa b’u Rwanda batarengeje imyaka 18 batsindwa n’ikipe y’u Burundi y’abakuru amanota 75 kuri 25.
Bashobora kuzatsindirwayo ariko hari byinshi bazunguka.
Mu bandi batorewe imyanya y’ubuyobozi muri FERWABA hari Freddy Makuza wagizwe visi perezida wa mbere wungirije na Jean Claude Murigo yagizwe visi perezida wa kabiri wungirije.
Nyuma yuko umuyobozi wa FERWABA, Kalisa Eric Salongo yeguye, FERWABA yasigaye iyoborwa na Albert Kayiranga by’agateganyo.
Byabaye ngombwa rero ko APR iyitera mpaga maze ihita ijya ku mukino wa nyuma.
Umukino ubanza wahuje aya makipe wabereye muri Gymnase ya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda maze APR itsinda amanota 52 kuri 35.
KBC yari yatsinze KIE amanota 78 kuri 45 mu mukino ubanza wabereye muri Gymnase ya kaminuza y’u Rwanda, yongeye kubisubiramo iyitsinda amanota 66 kuri 57mu mukino wabereye i Nyanza.
Umukino wimuriwe ku wa kabiri tariki ya 28 Gashyantare, ukazabera i Kigali.

Gutinda ahanini byatewe n’uko bari bakiganira n’umuterankunga, ariko ubu byose byamaze gukemuka ndetse n’ibyangombwa byose birahari nk’uko bitangazwa na Albert Kayiranga, uyobora by’agategano ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Basketball mu RwandaFERWABA.
Agace ka kabiri CSK yagatsinze ku manota 21 kuri 9 ya APR.
Andi makipe y’abagabo azaba agize itsinda rya kabiri ni Espoir BBC, Muzinga y’i Burundi na na CSK.
Ngewe nafashe icyemezo cyo kwegura kuko nabonaga ntarimo kumva kimwe ibijyanye no guteza imbere umukino wa Basketball.
Indi kipe yari ihagarariye u Rwanda muri iyi mikino ni Kigali basketball Club yo ikaba itararenze amatsinda kuko yatsinzwe imikino itatu itsinda imikino ibiri ihita isezererwa.
Mugabo akomeza avuga ko abo batoza hazigwa ku nshingano bahawe ndetse nibyo bemeranyijwe bityo bakareba niba barabikurikije ndetse nyuma bakareba niba basezererwa cyangwa bakongerwa amasezerano.
Emilienne Uwineza, umukinnyi w’ikipe ya mbere y’u Rwanda yavuze ko gutsindwa byatewe n’uko Afurika y’Epfo ibarusha inararibonye.
Ikipe y’u Rwanda igizwe n’amakipe abiri, buri kipe ikagira abakinnyi babiri ndetse hakaba n’umusimbura umwe ku makipe yombi nk’uko amategeko ya Beach Volleyball abiteganya.
Seti ya kabiri ikipe ya RRA yayitsinze ku manota 25-23, iya 3 yarangiye ari 25-24 naho iya nyuma yatumye RRA yerekeza muri yayitsinze ku manota 26-24.
Abakinnyi b’iyi kipe babonye ibyo bari bakeneye byose bizabafasha kwitwara neza, nk’uko Komiseri Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe Imisoro n’Amahoro RRA, Ben Kagarama Bahizi yabitangaje.
Nyuma yo gusezererwa, nk’uko bigenda buri gihe muri Volleyball, amakipe atabashije kujya muri cy’irangiza, abanza gukina imikino yo gushaka imyanya Match de classement.
Umukino wa mbere APR yakinnye yatsinzwe na GSU yo muri Kenya amaseti atatu ku busa 25-18, 26-24, 25-23.
Nubwo amakipe ari kurambagiza aba bakinnyi atarashyirwa ahagaragara, baracyafite amasezerano hamwe n’amakipe bakinira azageza mu kwezi kwa munani.
Igihugu cya Mauritius nicyo kizakira imikino y’abagabo izaba tariki 12-15042012.
Nyuma yo guca mu cyuma agakorerwa ibizamini, byahise byoherezwa Clairefontaine mu Bufaransa, kugira ngo abaganga babanze babyigeho.

Mu kiganiro twagiranye na Padiri Celestin Rwirangira, uyobora GSO Butare ubu, yadutangarije ko batumiye amakipe umunani y’abagabo n’ane y’abagore hakaziyongeraho ikipe izaba igizwe n’abahoze bakina Volleyball barezwe na Kayumba.
Murangwa Nelson ufite metero zisaga ebyiri ni umunyeshuri muri GS Indatwa y’i Butare akaba na Kapiteni w’ikipe yaho.
Ndamukunda ni umwe mu bakinnyi beza b’ikipe y’igihugu, ariko ubuhanga bwe bwakunze kubangamirwa n’imvune y’urutugu ndetse akaba agiye muri Algeria iyo mvune itarakira.
Kwizera agiye akurikiye abandi bakinnyi nka Mukunzi Christophe, Yakan Lawrence na Gasongo Vincent Dusabimana bakiniraga ikipe y’igihugu nabo bagiye gukina muri icyo gihugu.
Aya marushanwa azatwara ingengo y’imari ya miliyon 16 n’ibihumbi 330, aratangirira mu ntara y’Iburengerazuba mu karere ka Rubavu kuri uyu wa gatandatu.
Mu mukino wa nyuma ikipe ya Flavien na Mutesi yatsinze ikipe ya Marechal na Jean Luc amaseti 2-0.

Aya makipe yombi akaba yakinnye adafite abakinnyi yahoze igenderaho kuko Kaminuza yaburaga Dusabomana Vincent Gasongo, naho APR ikaba yaraburaga Yakan Laurence bombi bakaba baragiye gukina muri Algeria.
Bwa mbere mu mateka ya Volleyball mu Rwanda , isozwa rya shampiyona rigiye guhuzwa n’irushanwa risanzwe riterwa inkunga na SORAS rya carr d’as.
Uretse u Rwanda ruzakira iyi mikino, andi makipe azaryitabira harimo Burundi, Cameroon, DRC, Kenya, Namibia, Nigeria, Tanzania, Uganda na Zambia.
Abakobwa bakaba basigaje gukina ijonjora rya nyuma baritsinda bagahita berekeza mu mikino Olympique igomba kuzabera I Londres kuva tariki 27 Nyakanga ya kugeza tariki 12 Kanama 2011.
Nyuma y’aka gace ka 5, hazakinwa imikino ya kamarampaka playoffs, aho ikipe ya NUR izakina na KVC naho APR VC ikine na Lycee de Nyanza.
Ayo marushanwa yose azaba muri 2012 azabimburirwa na Tour du Maroc izaba tariki 23032012, ari naryo barimo kwitegura cyane.
Gasore Hategeka niwe wegukanye iri siganwa akurikirwa n’Uwamungu Innocent, Habiyambere Nicodeme aba uwa gatatu.
Undi munyarwanda wari utegerejwe na benshi mu majyepho ni Abraham Ruhumuriza.
Yongeye kwerekana ko afite ubuhanga mu gusiganwa ahamanuka n’ahatambika yongera kuba uwa mbere ubwo yakoraga ibirometero 140 ava i Rubavu agera i Muhanga anyuze mu muhanda wa Ngororero.
Mu kiciro cyabanje Ruhumuriza yari yaje ku mwanya wa 32.
Icyiciro cya mbere cyigizwe n’urugendo bakoze bahereye i Kigali berekeje i Rwamagana icyiciro cya mbere.
Reijnen Kiel ni we wabaye uwa mbere akoresheje iminota 04 n’amasegonda 22 n’iby’ijana 84, akurikirwa na bagenzi be babiri Rosskopf Joseph na Magner Tyler.
Icyo gihe umukinnyi wayo Daniel Teklehaimanot niwe wegukanye umwanya wa mbere.
U Rwanda rwagombaga kandi guserukirwa n’umukobwa witwa Angelique Mukandekezi ariko ngo kubera impamvu z’uko imyitozo ye itabaye myiza ubuyobozi bwa FERWACY bwahisemo kumusiga.
com yavuze ko bagiye gukomeza gushakisha abakinnyi bafite impano yo kunyonga igare hirya no hino mu gihugu ariko ngo ikibashishikaje cyane ni ugushyiraho ikigo cyihariye cyo gutoza abo bana.
Ku mwanya wa 4 haje uwitwa Innocent Uwamungu wo mu ikipe ya Rubavu akoresheje amasaha 3, iminota 29 n’amasegonda 15.

Nk’uko twabitangarijwe n’umunyamabanga uhoraho muri FREWACY Bwana Emmanuel Murenzi, ngo iri siganwa rizitabirwa n’abanyonzi 102, harimo 48 bazakoresha amagare yabugenewe na 54 bazakoresha amagare asanzwe.
Muri Volleyball y’abahungu, Urwunge rw’amashuli rwa Ruragwe rwatsinze ESI Mukungu amaseti 3-0, naho abakobwa b’urwunge rw’amashuli rwa mutagatifu Maria batsinda aba ESI Urumuri amaseti 3-0.
Umutoza w’iyo kipe Ngarambe Franois Xavier yadutangarije ko intego ibajyanye ari ukuzamuka mu itsinda barimo kuko bizaba bihagije ngo bahite babone itike yo kuzajya mu gikombe cy’isi.
Mbere y’uko iyo kipe y’igihugu yerekeza muri Congo Brazzaville, izabanza kugaruka i Kigali aho izamara ibyumweru bibiri ihakorere imyitozo mbere y’uko ijya i Brazzaville tariki 3082013.
Undi mukino umwe wabaye ku wa gatandatu, Gicumbi yazamutse ku mwanya wa kabiri, nyuma yo gutsinda Police ya Rubavu amanota 15 ku busa.
Amarushanwa y’umunsi mpuzamahanga w’abakozi yari yabereye mu karere ka Gicumbi.
Itsinda rya mbere rikinira ku nzu y’imikino ya Kimisagara, rigizwe na Gucumbi, Nyakabanda, APR na Zaza.
Mu bagabo, Gicumbi HC yari mu itsinda rimwe na Police Handball Club, APR Handball Club ndetse na Police ya Rubavu.

Gutoranya aba bana bakabazana mu mwiherero, ngo ni ukugirango uyu mukino wa Handball uzamukane imbaraga nyinshi nk’uko bitangazwa na Twahirwa Alphored umunyamabanga wa federation y’umukino wa Handball mu Rwanda.
irya mbere ririmo Police, Kigoma na SFB.
Mu yandi makipe y’abagabo yitabiriye iryo rushanwa harimo SFB, Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda, Stella Maris na Rubavu.
Iherutse kwegukana igikombe cya shampiyona ndetse initabira imikino mpuzamahanga ihuza amakipe y’akarere ka gatanu aho yegukanye umwanya wa kane mu mikino yaberaga muri Tanzania.
Aka karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba kazahagararirwa n’ikipe imwe mu bahungu ndetse n’imwe mu bakobwa.
Mu rwego rw’abahungu, umukino wa mbere ikipe y’u Rwanda itozwa na Slyvestre Shema Mudahari yatsinzwe na Uganda amanota 33 kuri 30.
Abatoza bazahabwa amahugurwa, ni abasanzwe bari ku rwego rwa mbere n’urwa kabiri mu gutoza Handball.
Police Handball yatwaye igikombe cyitiriwe intwari imaze gutsinda ku mukino wa nyuma Ecole Secondaire de Kigoma ibitego 29 kuri 21.
Mu wundi mukino wa cy’irangiza Cereals yo muri Kenya yanaje gutwara icyo gikombe, yasezereye Ngome yo muri Tanzania.
Abandi bakinnyi 4 bo berekeje i Roma mu isiganwa ryise Marathon International de Rome ni Nyirabarame Epiphanie, Mvuyekure Jean Pierre, Ntirenganya Felix na Twahirwa Fred.
Byabaye ngombwa ko hitabazwa polisi kuko Rurangirwa we yavugaga ko irushanwa byanga bikunda riri bube.
Muri izo ngando zizaba zigamije kongera ubumenyi mu mikino itandukanye ikinwa n’abamugaye, hazakinwa Volleyball, Goalball ikinwa n’abatabona ndetse n’imikino ngororamubiri athletisme.
Iri rushanwa rizabera ku kiyaga cya Muhazi, ku nkombe zo ku Karere ka Rwamagana, rizaba riri ku rwego rw’igihugu nubwo abasanzwe bitabira amarushanwa bo mu Mujyi wa Kigali batazaryitabira.

Rurangirwa avuga ko minisiteri ya Siporo niyanga kumusubiza ibyo biro bishobora kuba ikibazo gikomeye kuko Ishyirahamwe ry’imikino ngororamubiri ku isi IAAF ari we ryemera nk’umuyobozi w’iyo mikino mu Rwanda.
Ibibazo byinshi byaranze iri shyirahamwe muri uyu mwaka byaturutse ku isiganwa ryitwa Kigali International Peace Marathon yabereye i Kigali mu kwezi kwa gatanu.
Umutoza wa Nyirabarame ariwe Murenzi Emmanuel yatangarije ikinyamakuru Izuba Rirashe ko kuba umukinnyi we yatangiye imyitozo, bimuha icyizere ko azaboneka mu mikino Olempike.
Ikindi ni uko aya mahugurwa azafasha abatoza kandi mu gushimangira gahunda zigamije guteza imbere umukino wa Tennis mu bihugu bigize akarere k’Afurika y’i Burasirazuba muri rusange.
Ati aho dukorera niho mbogamizi ya mbere ituma umuntu atabasha kugera mu marushanwa ku buryo no kujya gukorera imikandara usanga bituvuna.
Mutarambirwa avuga ko yahisemo kwigisha umuryango we wose karate kubera ko uyu mukino ubamo ikinyabufura kidasanzwe.
Rudakenga aniseti w’imyaka 53 ni umwe mu bitabiriye uyu mukino bakuze, yadutangarije ko uyu mukino yakundiye byinshi nko kugorora ingingo.

Imikandara y’uwo mukino bafite bayikuye mu marushanwa atandukakanye abera hanze y’akarere bavukamo ariko hari n’igihe batumiza abamaze gutera imbere muri Karate maze bakaza kubakoresha ibizamini, passage bakabaha imikandara.
Gusa ntibyahereye aho kuko ubu babiri muri bo bamaze kwegukana imidali ya Bronze.
Twamubajije uko yabyakira n’akamaro byamugirira aramutse yegukanye PGGSS season 2Numva ikintu cyonyine byamarira ari ukujya muri studio iri professionnel ku rwego rw’Isi.
Yagize ati Njyewe nkora ku buryo buri ndirimbo yanjye igira nibura ijambo rimwe isigira abantu bakajya barikoresha nka terme mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi.
Abazatorera kuri interineti, hari uburyo bwo kubikurikirana ku buryo e-mail y’umuntu izajya ibona amahirwe yo gutora inshuro imwe gusa ku munsi.
Ku mwanya wa gatatu haza umuraperi Eminem we waguriwe indirimbo n’abantu bagera kuri miliyoni 42, 2.
Bije kandi bikurikira ukutumvikana kwari gusigaye kuranga Muyoboke n’itsinda Dream Boys.
Njyewe byanjemo gutyo gusa ndabyandika.
Amafaranga yose yinjije akaba akubye kabiri umukurikiye mu kwinjiza amafaranga menshi.
Iyo inzu ubu iri kugurishwa cyamunara ifite agaciro k’amadorali y’Amerika 665.
Mu ikubitiro arashaka gukorana na Lick Lick cyangwa Masota indirimbo Nyampinga na Ntibishoboka mu minsi ya vuba.
Byatumye basobanukirwa neza n’ububabare bariya bantu bafite, bumva nabo bagomba gufasha no gutanga inkunga n’imbaraga byabo nk’abahanzi.
Icyagaragaye ni uko ibyo bari biyemeje byose kugeraho muri iki gitaramo bashoboye kubigeraho uretse ko abahanzi bamwe babatengushye mu kutubahiriza igihe bagombaga kuhagerera.
Samputu yarayitumiwemo nk’intumwa y’amahoro y’umuryango w’abibumbye Akaba yaratanze ikiganiro nk’umunyarwanda wababariye abamugiriye nabi.
Yavuze ko iyo ndirimbo yaburiye muri studio Cool Vibes i Muhanga hakaba hashize imyaka 2.
Muri iri rushanywa hahangana abaririmbyi baturuka mu gihugu kimwe kandi bari mu kiciro kimwe.
Mu ndirimbo eshatu za mbere zatowe harimo ndirimbo ya J-Kid yitwa Udasimburwa .
kandi kwisi ntawe ukora ikintu na kimwe adafitemo inyungu.
Dream Boyz bavuga ko ubwo ubushobozi buturuka ku ntambwe nziza bagenda batera mu kazi kabo ka muzika.
Kigali Today iganira na Kamichi akaba yayitangarije ko album Umugabirwa izaba iriho indirimbo 14 kugeza tariki ya 13 Ukwakira 2011 hakaba hamaze kurangira indirimbo 9.
Iki gitaramo kizaba cyatumiwemo abahanzi batandukanye harimo Kizigenza wo mugihugu cy’u Burundi uzwi ku izina rya Kidum ,benshi rero bakaba bamuziho gucuranga neza LIVE MUSIC.

Akaba yaringeye gushingira no ku rubyiruko rw’iki gihe aho hari abashobora guhura n’ubuzima bubasaba kubaho nabi bitewe no kubura ababyeyi cyangwa gutandukana kwabo ariko buri umwe akagira uko abyitwaramo.

Filime zamuritswe ni Mariza, Impamvu, Umuringa, Ineza Yawe ndetse na firime yakozwe n’abantu baturuka mu gihugu cy’Uburundi, zikaba zije gukuraho karande yo kureba firime zikina ibibera mu bindi bihugu.
Yishyize hamwe n’ayo masosiyete kugira ngo bajye bamenyekanisha filimi zabo hirya no hino mu Rwanda.
Uwo mugore wakomokaga mu bwoko bwanenwaga mu Rwanda, kuko byavugwaga ko urongoye umugore cyangwa umukobwa wo muri ubu bwoko akira zimwe mu ndwara zirimo n’umugongo.

Gusa kumenya kwerekana urukundo ubwabyo ni ikintu kidakorwa kimwe kuko usanga ubumenyi tubifeho butandukanye.
Nakunze umugore w’umuyisilamukazi duturanye ariko akaba afite umugabo umufuhira cyane, ubu mfite impungenge ko ashobora kuzangirira nabi akaba yanyica.
Uyu mugabo tumaze imyaka itatu dushakanye ariko ambwira ko iwacu kwa nyirabukwe batamwubaha, bityo ngo inka imwe yankoye yapfuye ubusa.
Iri ni ihame abantu twese duhuriyeho mu buzima, no mu rukundo rero naho ni uko kugira ngo umuntu agire icyo ageraho.

Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha RIB rwongeye kwibutsa abaturarwanda ko gukubita no gukomeretsa ari icyaha gihanwa n’ingingo y’ 121 y’itegeko N682018 ryo ku wa 30082018 riteganya ibyaha n’ibihano muri rusange.

Abaturanyi bavuga ko nyakwigendera yaburiwe irengero muri Nyakanga umwaka ushize wa 2019, babaza umugabo we akababwira ko nyakwigendera yataye urugo ajya muri Uganda.
Polisi y’ u Rwanda yatangaje ko yataye muri yombi ukekwaho kwambura umucuruzi wa mitiyu mu mujyi wa Kigali, mugenzi we araraswa.
Umuryango wo mu karere ka Musanze uherutse gusaka abana bawo babiri bahiriye mu nzu uvuga ko usanzwe utabanye neza n’abaturanyi ndetse ngo bigeze no kwitwa inzoka.
Iri tangazo rivuga ko iperereza rikomeje ngo hamenyekane icyatumye Kizito Mihigo yiyahura.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha RIB rwatangaje ko rwatanye muri yombi Umuhanzi Kizito Mihigo, akekwaho ibyaha birimo na ruswa.
Mureshyankwano Rose wigeze kuba Umudepite ndetse akaba na Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyepfo mbere yo gutorerwa kujya muri Sena y’u Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w’ aka karere Mushabe Claudien yavuze ko utu dusimba twagaragaye mu ruyuzi rw’ umuturage tugera nko kuri 50, yongeraho ko atari inzige.
Umugabo witwa Hakizimana Aloys yafatiwe mu cyuha agerageza guha ruswa y’ ibihumbi 40 umukozi w’ urwego rw’ubugenzacyaha RIB.
Yagize ati Saa kumi za mu gitondo nibwo iyi mpanuka twayimenye,umuturage ahamagaye avuga ko habaye impanuka, tujyayo dusanga yagonze borne ariya mapoto aba ari ku muhanda, iramanuka agonga igiti.
Izi mbabazi yasisabye nyuma y’uko kuri twitter yashyizwe ubutumwa buvuga ko byagenze.
Imvura idasanzwe yaraye igwa yahitanye abantu 13 mu gihugu hose, by’umwihariko mu mujyi wa Kigali yisheyo abantu 10 barimo abantu 7 bo mu muryango umwe.
Ati Icyo twasaba abadepite ni uko bazongera bakicara bagasuzuma neza iyo ngingo kuko abamotari n’abashoferi turaharenganira.
Umusore witwa Uwimana Charles yatawe muri yombi yiyemera ko yishe nyina amusanze mu musarane aho yamukubitiye amatafari ya rukarakara.
Urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha RIB mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 22 Mutarama 2020 rwataye muri yombi umugabo witwa Kanyamuhanda Jean Bosco ukekwaho icyaha cyo kwica umugore we.
Urwego rw’igihugu rw’ubugenzacyaha RIB rwataye muri yombi umugabo witwa Nsanzumukiza Hashim akurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gutema umugabo yari asanze amusambanyiriza umugore.
Umusaza w’imyaka 64 wo mu murenge wa Kigembe mu karere ka Gisagara akurikiranyweho gusambanya umwana w’umukobwa w’imyaka ine wari utembereye akagera iwe.

Bamwe mu baturage bo mu murenge wa Bumbogo mu karere ka Gasabo, baravuga ko bahangayikishijwe n’ishyamba ryiswe irya MINAGRI risa n’iryigaruriwe n’agatsiko k’amabandi asambanya abagore ku ngufu akanambura abarinyuramo.
Umugabo Sixbert utari ufitanye n’ umugore we amakimbirane azwi bamusanze amanitse mu mugozi binjiye mu nzu basanga umugore Uwamariya yishwe atemaguwe.
Bavuga ko ahanini babiterwa n’ amikoro make gusa hari abavuga ko harimo n’ abafite ikibazo cy’ imyumvire ikiri hasi.
Barohamye muri pisine ifatanye n’ inyanja mu majyepfo ya Espagne tariki 24 Ukuboza 2019 bucya ari noheli.
Imvura idasanzwe yaguye mu gihugu hose kuri uyu wa 25 Ukuboza 2019 yahitanye abantu 12 mu gihugu hose nk’ uko bitangazwa na Leta y’ u Rwanda.
Umusore wiga muri IPRC Huye yatawe muri yombi akurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gufata ku ngufu umukobwa bigana muri iki kigo.
Yatawe muri yombi ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 23 Ukuboza 2019 nyuma gato yo kuganira n’ itangazamakuru ahakana ibyo abaturage bamushinja.
Mbuto Meshake ukomoka mu karere ka Rubavu wajyanywe Iwawa mu kwezi kwa 52018 afite ubumuga abaganga bamubwiye ko butazakira.
Leta ya Nebraska ni imwe muri Leta 53 zigize Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika, iherereye mu gihugu hagati ariko ku ruhande rw’ Iburengerazuba.
Yagize ati Dear imbabazi nazihawe ikirego kitaratangwa ndetse ari nabwo narihaga ibyo nangije gusa nyuma ntungurwa n’ ikirego.
Iyi mvura irakomeje Abanyarwanda batuye mu manegeka babifashijwemo n’ ubuyobozi bw’ inzego z’ibanze barasabwa kuhimuka bwangu.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ Ubugenzacyaha rwatangaje ko rwataye muri yombi abakoresha 2 bakurikiranyweho gukoresha abana imirimo ibujijwe n’ amategeko.
Umugore wo mu murenge wa Kigarama Akagari ka Nyankurazo, Umudugudu wa Rusumo akurikiranyweho kwica umugabo we Hazadi Yusufu bari bafitanye amakimbirane.
Gatabazi yavuze ko iki ari ikiciro cya mbere cy’Abanyarwanda amagana bafungiye muri Uganda muri gereza za Kisoro na Kabare.
Nyiragendahimana Vestine, yanze kugira icyo avuga ku byo ashinjwa adusaba ko tuvugisha, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’ Umurenge kuko ariwe umukuriye.
Umusore wigaga muri Kaminuza ya Christian University of Rwanda CHUR mu mujyi wa Kigali acumbitse mu murenge wa Gitega mu karere ka Nyarugenge yitabye Imana azize urupfu rw’ amayobera.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha RIB rweretse itangazamakuru Herman Nsengimana wari umuvugizi wa FLN na Thobald Mutarambirwa, wari Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Ishyaka PS-Imberakuri, bafatiwe muri Congo.
Mu murenge wa Nyamiyaga mu karere ka Kamonyi, ikirombi gicukurwamo amabuye ya konkase cyagwiriye abantu batanu 3 barapfa 2 barakomereka.
Abaturage bati ’na Nyina w’ uwo mwana yagiyeyo gushaka umwana we uwo mugabo amufata ku ngufu amufatiyeho icyuma’.
Tariki 27 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo mu ishyamba riri mu murenge wa Ngoma ku muhanda uva ku Mukoni werekeza I Mpare habonetse umurambo w’ umusore utarahise amenyekana imyirondoro.
Bikekwa ko byakozwe n’ abagizi ba nabi bitwiriye ijoro kuko muri uyu muhanda nta rumuri ruhari.
Abaturage bo mu kagari ka Mpare umurenge wa Tumba basaba ubuyobozi kubahindurira abanyerondo bitwa ab’ umwuga kuko ngo bateza umutekano muke aho kuwurinda.
Mu murenge wa Tumba mu karere ka Huye harasiwe umusorwe witwa Gasasira Felix agerageza gutoroka nk’ uko bitangazwa na Polisi y’ u Rwanda.
Umugabo w’ imyaka 39 wakoraga akazi ko kwikorera imizigo yabonetse mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 21 Ukuboza 2019 yabonetse yapfiriye mu gikari cy’ akabari.
Abaturage bo mu karere ka Huye murenge wa Mukura mu kagari ka Bukomeye umudugudu wa Bweramana bavuga ko batewe ubwoba n’ icyobo Abashinwa bakuyemo laterite bagasiga batahasubiranyije.
Kamagaju Jacqueline utuye muri metero nkeya uvuye kuri iki kinogo avuga gikomeje kwiyongera kandi ngo iyo gitengutse gitigisa inzu ye ku buryo aba afite ubwoba ko izamugwaho.
Abakoresha uyu muhanda barasabwa guhindura by’ agateganyo bakaba bakoresha umuhanda Huye-Nyamagabe-Nyungwe-Nyamasheke.
Polisi y’ u Rwanda yatangaje ko bitewe n’ amazi yiyongereye mu mugezi wa Nyabarongo akarengera umuhanda , uyu muhanda Muhanga - Ngororero - Mukamira.
Abaturage bo muri iyi mirenge bavuga ko uwo musozi waridutse mu gicuku saa saba, barara bahagaze, gusa ku bw’ amahirwe nta muturage wahasize ubuzima nubwo hasenyutse amazu 13.
Leta y’ u Rwanda ivuga ko itatangajwe n’amagambo akomeye ya Leta y’u Burundi ashinja u Rwanda kugaba igitero ku Burundi, ibirego nk’ibyo ngo byahereye mu mwaka wa 2015.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB rwemeje amakuru ko uwitwa Jackie Umuhoza yafashwe ejo ku wa gatatu agafungwa akekwaho ubutasi n’ubugambanyi.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ Ubugenzacyaha RIB kuri uyu wa 26 Ugushyingo 2019 rwatangaje ko rwataye muri yombi abantu batandatu bakekwaho gukora ubucuruzi butemewe.
Umwarimu wo mu karere ka Nyagatare afungiye kuri sitasiyo y’ urwego rw’ igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB nyuma yo gufatirwa mu cyuho aryamanye n’ umunyeshuri yigisha.
Urwego rw’ igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB rwatangaje ko rwataye muri yombi Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kibirizi mu Karere ka Nyanza Habineza Jean Baptiste.
Urukiko rwisumbuye rwa Gisenyi rwakatiye Mbanjimbere Faustin wari Perezida wa koperative Rwango Jean Claude wari umunyamabanga wayo gufungwa iminsi 30.
Aha hantu hitwa Muyurupfu ni muri metero zitarenze 500 uvuye ku biro by’ akarere ka Ruhango utambikiye munsi y’ urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi.
Bageze mu gikari cy’ uwitwa Bajiji Francois wo mu mudugudu wa Paraje, Akagari ka Nyarusange bahasanga ibidomoro birimo kambuca, imifuka ipakiyemo uducupa turimo ubusa, n’ ibindi bikoresho.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa Polisi y’u Rwanda IGP Dan Munyuza, yakiriye mu biro bye Gen.
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu mudugudu wa Nyarunyinya akagari ka Rusagara barashinja umuyobozi w’ umudugudu Barutwanayo Emmanuel ko afatanya n’ umuyobozi w’ akagari bagatera ubwoba abaturage.
Amakuru atangazwa n’ inzego z’ ibanze aravuga ko uyu musore yagerageje kurwanya inzego z’ umutekano ubwo zari zigiye kumuta muri yombi.
Mu murenge wa Muko mu karere ka Musanze haravugwa urupfu rw’amayobera rw’uwitwa NKORERA Jean ngo watonganye n’uwo abaturage bita umupfumu akamucira akarongo hasi undi yakarenga agahita apfa.
Umunyeshuri witwa Bizimana Pierre wari urangije muri Kaminuza y’ u Rwanda mu ishami rya Huye mu bijyanye na Finance yitabye Imana avuye gufata ikanzu ya graduation.
Uyu mugabo ari kwivuriza ku Kigo Nderabuzima cya Nyabimata.
Umugabo witwa Nsanzabagabo Bonaventure wo mu murenge wa Musaza mu karere ka Kirehe yishe umugore we Musabyemariya Beatrice amuciye ijosi nawe agerageza kwiyahura.
Byabereye mu kagari ka Rukandabyuma umudugudu wa Seta kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 23 Ukwakira 2019 ahagana saa tatu za mu gitondo 900am.
Ngo yabanje kwanga kubyemera ariko ngo hashize ibyumweru bibiri yavuganye n’ umugore we arabimwemerera ndetse amubwira ko bwana ikuramo seti.
Iperereza ryari rimaze igihe rikorwa ku rupfu rw’ umugore wagonze igiti ari muri gare ya moshe ryagiye ahagaragara.
Mu rubavu rw’ umugi wa Huye ahazwi nko mu Rwabayaga hari icyobo kinini gicukurwa n’ amazi.
Gasagara yatawe muri yombi n’ urwego rw’ igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha akekwaho gusambanya umunyeshuri.
Ubuyobozi burasaba abafitanye amakimbirane kwegera abayobozi bakabafasha kuyakemura hakiri kare.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB rwataye muri yombi Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’ akagari ka Kagitumba, umurenge wa Matimba mu karere ka Nyagatare akurikiranyweho icyaha cy’ ubuhemu.
Hari amakuru avuga ko uyu mukobwa wishwe yaba yari asanzwe akorera uburaya ahitwa Mukarekare.
Imirambo y’aba bana Mudatenguha Aswab mwene Nsengiyumva Ahmed na mubyara we Benimana Afia bose b’imyaka itatu, yabonetse mu cyobo kiri mu rutoki mu kagari ka Buhaza, Umurenge wa Rubavu.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 18 Ugushyingo 2019 imodoka ya Bralirwa yakoreye impanuka mu muhanda Huye- Akanyaru ipakiye inzoga abaturage aho gutabara ahubwo basahura inzoga banakomeretsa mugenzi wabo.
Umugabo w’ uyu mugore avuga ko tariki 9 Ugushyingo 2019 aribwo umugore we yagiye ku kigo nderabuzima kubyara.

Mu itangazo rigenewe abanyamakuru polisi y’u Rwanda yashyize ahagaragara, yavuze ko aba bantu bashatse kurwanya abapolisi bari bacunze umutekano, maze mu kwirwanaho bakabarasa hagapfamo babiri, abandi bagahita bahunga.
Umugabo witwa Gatorano Boniface yatawe muri yombi akekwaho kugira uruhare mu rupfu rw’ umugabo witwa Emmanuel utagiraa aho kuba.
Itegeko No 192002 ryo ku wa 17052002 ryahinduye izina rya RPA, ingabo zihabwa irindi zina rya RDF.
Urwego rw’ igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB rwatangaje ko rwataye muri yombi itsinda ry’ abantu 12 bakekwaho kugerageza kwiba Equity Bank bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga.
Inzego z’ umutekano zifatanyije n’ abayobozi beretse abaturage abantu bane bakekwahi guhungabanya umutekano w’ igihugu mu bitero bine byagabye mu karere ka Rusizi mu bihe bitandukanye.
Kuri Sitasiyo ya RIB mu murenge wa Busasamana hafungiye umunyeshuri w’ imyaka 25 ukurikiranyweho gufata ku ngufu umukobwa w’ imyaka 21 ukora akazi ko mu rugo abanje kumutera ubwoba.
Iyi mpanuka yabereye mu Mudugudu wa Tagaza, Akagari ka Rubona, mu Murenge wa Nyamyumba saa 9 20 mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 22 Ukwakira 2019.
Ngo avuga ko impamvu yamuteye kwiyicira umugore bari bamaranye igihe gito ndetse bataranabyarana ari uko yavumbuye ko mbere y’uko bashakana ngo yari yarashatse undi mugabo kandi yarabimuhishe.
Byabereye hafi y’ aho Mwogo ihurira Mbirurume bikitwa Nyabarongo muri metero nka 200 uvuye aho Nyabarongo itangirira.
RIB yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 14 Ukwakira 2019 ubwo yari yegereje serivise zayo abaturage bo mu murenge wa Ruheru mu karere ka Nyaruguru.
Byabereye mu murenge wa Kaduha, Akagari ka Kavumu , Umudugudu wa Bango.
Urwego rw’ igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB rwataye muri yombi abagabo babiri batekeye umukobwa umutwe bakamwambura telefone bakanamusambanya.
Umugabo witwa Kabera Governor ari gushakishwa n’ inzego z’ umutekano, birakekwa ko yishe umugore we Mukeshimana Vestine agahita atoroka.
Polisi y’ u Rwanda ivuga ko inzego z’ umutekano zihutiye gutabara no guhumuriza abaturage mu gihe aba bagizi ba nabi bakirimo gushakishwa.
Imvura ivanze n’ umuyaga yasenye icumbi ry’ ishuri ’Ecole Secondaire de Gikonko’ ryo mu murenge wa Gikonko abanyeshuri batandatu barakomereka byoroheje.
Umwarimu witwa Hatangimana Ndori Jean Bosco wigishaga mu rwunge rw’amashuri rwa Cyapa arakekwaho kwica umugore we Uzamukunda Console amunize nawe akimanika mu mugozi.
Umugabo witwa HABARUREMA Jean Claude bakundaga kwita Gasore bikekwa ko yari atwaye magendu y’inkweto yarashwe n’ umupolisi amasasu ane ahita apfa.
Dusabumuremyi Sylidio wakoraga muri Cantine y’Ikigo Nderabuzima cya Shyogwe mu Karere ka Muhanga yiciwemo n’abantu bataramenyekana bamuteye ibyuma ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 23 Nzeri 2019.
Mukakaremera Immaculle w’ imyaka 32 arakekwaho kwica umwana we w’ ukwezi kumwe, yatawe muri yombi naho umurambo w’ umwana wajyanywe ku bitaro bya CHUB.
Muri ayo macumbi y’ abarimu hanafatiwemo undi mwarimu w’ imyaka 28 ari kumwe n’ umukobwa uvuga ko afite imyaka 19.
Aba bose ubu barimo gukurikiranwa n’inzego zibishinzwe kugirango bagezwe imbere y’ubutabera.
Kwizera Patrick wigaga mu mwaka wa mbere w’amashuri yisumbuye muri GS Murira mu murenge wa Muganza w’akarere ka Rusizi amaze amezi atiga, avuga ko mwarimu we yamuvunnye ukuboko.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB rwatangaje ko rwataye muri yombi umuturage wamburaga abaturage amafaranga yiyita umukozi wa RIB.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rushinzwe imfungwa n’ abagororwa rwemeje amakuru avuga ko hari abagororwa batatu barashwe bagapfa ubwo bagerageragezaga gucika gereza ya Mageragere.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 8 Nzeri 2019, nibwo uyu mugabo Straton yakubitiye mu nzira umugore we Mukakabayiza Marie wari ufite imyaka 48 bimuviramo urupfu.
Imanishimwe Sandrine wigaga muri Kaminuza y’ u Rwanda ishami rya Kigali muri CST ahahoze hitwa KIST umurambo we watoraguwe mu kigo birakekwa ko yishwe.
Uwapfiriye muri iriya mpanuka yari Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’irondo ry’Umwuga Patrol Commander mu Murenge wa Kabarore, yitwa NIZEYUMUKIZA Anastase nk’uko bigaragara ku byangombwa bye.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabili tariki 3 Nzeri mu rufunzo rwo ku ruzi rw’ Akagera habonetse abana batatu bo mu miryango ibiri itandukanye bapfuye.
Byatewe n’ imvura idasanzwe yaguye ku mugoroba wo kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 1 Nzeli 2019.
Polisi y’ u Rwanda yatangaje ko abantu 19 mu bagabye igitero mu karere ka Musanze bakica abaturage mu mirenge ya Kinigi na Musanze bishwe abandi 5 bafatwa mpiri.
Abantu bataramenyekaba bagabye igitero mu karere ka Musanze bica abaturage mu murenge wa Kinigi, hari amakuru avuga ko abapfuye barenga 10.
Umugore wari warahukanye akagaruka gutwara abana yitwa Umumararungu Rebecca.

Mu murenge wa Cyanika mu mu karere Nyamagabe hamaze kuboneka imibiri 104 y’ abatutsi bishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, igikorwa cyo gushakisha indi mibiri kirakomeje hanitabajwe imashini ihinga.
Ni umukwabu wakozwe na REG ifatanyije n’inzego zirimo Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB, Polisi y’u Rwanda n’abaturage.
Ubuyobozi burasaba abaturage gutanga amakuru igihe cyose babonye umuntu batazi.
Umusore witwa Hategekimana Silas wakoraga akazi ko gupagasa mu murenge wa Runda yishwe n’ ingona yamufatiye ku nkombe za Nyabarongo yahira ubwatsi bw’ inka.
Umukozi wo mu rugo wari ufite imyaka 25 arakekwaho kwica abana batatu bo mu rugo yakoragamo yarangiza akajya kwimanika mu mugozi mu gikoni.
Umuyobozi w’ikigo cy’amashuri abanza cya Complexe Scolaire de la Fraternite mu Karere ka Rubavu,Murigande Fulgence w’imyaka 37 arashinjwa gufata umwana w’umukobwa w’imyaka 10 akamusomera mu biro.
Umugabo wo mu murenge wa Gisenge mu karere ka Rubavu yakubise umugore witwa Solange basangiye inzoga ikintu mu mutwe aramunegekaza.
Abarimu bafashwe ni uwitwa Mukaremera Christine ufite imyaka 29 na Niyonshuti Theoneste ufite imyaka 37.
Yagize ati Nakubitiwe Muruhame n’ umugabo witwa Dr Francis GoodRich TV.
Umugabo wo mu mujyi wa Kigali, akarere ka Gasabo Umurenge wa Jali yafatiye mu cyuho umukobwa biteguraga gushyingiranwa ahita ajya kwiyahura.
Umukobwa w’ imyaka 25 witwa Scolastique Hatangimana kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 6 Nzeri yasimbutse umuturirwa wa Makuza, Makuza Peace Plazza ashaka kwiyahura ntiyapfa.
Umuyobozi w’ Akarere ka Huye Ange Sebutege avuga ko harimo gushakwa ingengo y’ imari yo kwimura Gereza ya Huye kuko ngo kuba iri mu mujyi ubwabyo ni ikibazo.

Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame akaba n’Umugaba w’Ikirenga w’Ingabo z’u Rwanda RDF yakoze impinduka mu gisirikari, aho Maj Gen Emmanuel Bayingana yagizwe Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo zirwanira mu Kirere.
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa Gatanu no ku wa Gatandatu Polisi y’ u Rwanda ishami rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda yataye muri yombi abashoferi 88 bafashwe batwaye basinze.
Ni ubukwe kandi abatari bacye bakunze kutavugaho rumwe, aho bamwe banavugaga ko Kwizera azajya ata umugore we akajya kwishakira abandi bakobwa bakiri bato.
Kuri sitasiyo y’ Urwego rw’ igihugu rw’ Ubugenzacyaha RIB mu Murenge wa Gihango mu Karere Rutsiro hafungiye umugabo witwa Nkinamubanzi ukurikiranyweho gutema inka imirizo n’ amaguru.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 24 Kanama 2019 ku Mukobwamwiza habereye impanuka y’ imodoka y’ ivatiri yarenze umuhanda abari bayirimo bose barakomereka harimo abakomeretse bikomeye.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ Ubugenzacyaha RIB rwatangaje ko umurambo wasanzwe mu ivatiri mu karere ka Gasabo ari uwa Callixte Ndahimana ukomoka mu karere ka Kamonyi.
Ingabo zo mu bihugu 26 birimo Leta z’ Ubumwe za Amerika ziri mu Rwanda mu myitozo yo kubungabunga amahoro no gucunga umutekano.
Abaturage bavuga ko impamvu bamwe muri badafite ubwiherero ari ukubera ubukene gusa ngo hari n’ abafite ikibazo cy’ imyumvire.
Urwego rw’ Igihugu rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB rwataye muri yombi umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’ Umurenge wa Muhanga Ntezirembo Jean Claude akurikiranyweho gufata ku ngufu umukobwa ukora mu kabari.
Yari yafunguwe mu minsi ishize ariko habonetse ibimenyetso bituma akomeza gukurikiranwa.
Izi mpanuka zakomerekeyemo babiri barimo umushoferi w’ iyi vatiri n’ umugenzi umwe.
Mu karere ka Gakenke, ubuyobozi bwatangaje ko bugiye gufatanya na Polisi y’ u Rwanda kugira ngo bashake uko bakwikiza imbwa ziri kurya amatungo y’ abaturage.
Abacukuye ibyo byobo biri mu mirima y’ abaturage bivugwa ko babicukuye mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko bahise batoroka.
Itangazo ryasohowe n’Umujyi wa Kigali rivuga ko abashinzwe umutekano mu muhanda n’abakozi bahagarariye iyo mirimo bazaba bari ahubakwa kugira ngo bereke abanyamaguru aho bagomba kwambukira.
Saa saba z’ ijoro ryakeye nibwo uyu mugabo yatwitse umugore we Clarisse w’ imyaka 19 babanaga mu buryo butemewe n’ amategeko.

Uwo mugabo ntasanzwe azwi muri ako gace ndetse n’abaturage batuye ahabereye ayo mahano ntawabashije kumumenya nk’uko byemejwe n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Akagari ka Gihara mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.

Umuhanzi w’imyaka 22 y’amavuko witwa Micah akomeje gutangaza abantu kubera imiterere ye, n’ubwo ari umusore akaba afite ibibuno n’imiterere bimeze nk’iby’abakobwa ndetse agaragara nk’abagore kuburyo arusha ibibuno abagore benshi.
Umuhanzi w’Umurundi Jean Christophe Matata wakunzwe cyane mu Rwanda, mu Burundi no mu Bubirigi, itariki ya 3 Mutarama ntizibagirana kuko aribwo yarangije ubuzima bwe bwo ku isi.
Mbere y’ibi ariko, azakora ibitaramo bihambaye byo gusezera ku bakunzi b’umuziki be batari bacye.
Yakomeje agira ati Nibabareka bakagenda turahita tubwira ubuyobozi ntibuzabemerere kugaruka mu gihugu no mugihe iminsi 30 twihaye izaba ishize kuo nta wamenya uko bazaba bahagaze.
Ronaldo afite hoteli ebyiri iwabo mu gihugu cya Portugal, imwe ikaba iri mu murwa mukuru Lisbon naho indi ikaba i Madeira ari nako gace uyu mukinnyi avukamo.
Myugariro w’ikipe ya Rayon Sports, Iragire Saidi yasezeranye imbere y’amategeko n’umugore we nyuma y’imyaka igera kuri itanu bari bamaze babana nk’umugore n’umugabo.
Minisiteri ya siporo yasabye ko amakipe yose aturuka mu Rwanda yagombaga kwitabira amarushanwa yo hanze y’igihugu yareka kuyitabira kubera ubwoba bw’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Nk’uko bigaragara mu ibaruwa yandikiwe abanyamuryango bose b’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwandaamakipe, bayamenyesheje ko bagomba kubahiriza izo ngamba, zikaba zafashwe hagendewe ku mabwiriza ya Misisitiri w’intebe.
Uko niko igice cya mbere cyaje kurangira amakipe yombi ajya mu karuhuko anganya igitego 1-1.
Ni umukino iraza kuba yakiramo ikipe ya Musanze FC kuri sitade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo ku isaaha ya saa 15h00’.
Buregeye Prince nawe ari mubakinnyi berekeje Huye ari kugenda agaruka mubihe bye nyuma yo kuva mu mvune.
Ni nyuma y’uko icyorezo cya Covid-19 Coronavirus kigaragaye muri America ndetse kugeza ubu abagera kuri batandatu bakaba bamaze guhitanwa nacyo muri iki gihugu.
Ni umukino rutahizamu Cristiano Ronaldo wahoze akinira iyi kipe yo mu bwami bwa Madrid yagaragayemo yishimira intsinzi yayo dore ko yari yaje no kwihera ijisho aho iyi kipe ikina.
Ku munsi wa kabiri w’isiganwa ry’amagare rizenguruka u Rwanda tour du Rwanda 2020 , abasiganwa bahagurutse I Kigali berekeza I Huye Umunya-Ethiopia Hailemichael Kinfe yegukana aka gace.
Vanessa Bryant kuri uyu wa Gatatu yavuze ku nshuro ya mbere ku rupfu rw’umugabo Kobe Bryant n’umukobwa we Gianna bishwe n’impanuka ya kajugujugu ati umuryango ushegeshwe burundu n’ibi byago.
Uruganda rwa AzamBakhresa Grain Milling Rwanda Ltd rukora ibinyobwa ndetse n’ifarini rwasinye amasezerano na APR FC y’imyaka ine ku kiguzi cya miliyoni 228 Rwf .
Aya mafaranga amenshi bayohereza mu Rwanda kugira ngo bakomeze ibikorwa by’ iterambere.
Myugariro wa Rayon Sports n’Amavubi Rugwiro yarekuwe kuri uyu wa 3 Mutarama 2020, nyuma y’ibyumweru hafi bitatu yari amaze afungiye mu Karere ka Rubavu ashinjwa gukoresha inyandiko mpimbano.
Ikipe ya Rayon Sports iherutse kwirukana uwari umutoza wayo umunya-Mexique Javier Martinez, biravugwa ko ishaka kumusimbuza umutoza wa AFC Leopards Casa Mbungo.
Ikipe ya Rayon Sports benshi isanzwe izwiho kugira abafana benshi igiye guca agahigo ko kuba ikipe ya mbere mu Rwanda igize televiziyo yayo.
Uyu abaye umwe mu bahitanywe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus baragize ibigwi n’amazina akomeye mu mupira w’amaguru.
Iki cyemezo gifashwe nyuma y’uko umwe mu bakinnyi b’ikipe ya Juventus asuzumwe bikagaragara ko yanduye iki cyorezo ndetse n’umwe mu bakinnyi ba Real Madrid.
Mu mujyi wa London mu Bwongereza bapimye umutoza mukuru w’ikipe ya Arsenal Mikel Arteta bamusangamo icyorezo cya coronavirus gihangayikishije isi muri iyi minsi.
Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda FERWAFA riranyomoza amakuru yavugaga ko ikipe y’iguhugu Amavubi atazitabira CHAN 2020 iteganyijwe muri Mata uyu mwaka.
Ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe bwagaragaje ko bwugarijwe n’ubukene aho bwagaragaje ko nibura kugirango ibibazo ifite bikemuke hakenewe asaga miliyoni 96 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Muri iyi nama kandi hemejwe ko mu mikino n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza abantu benshi hagomba gushyirwaho uburyo bworohereza abantu kugira isuku no kubakangurira kwirinda iki cyorezo.
Uyu munsi habaye imikino itatu harimo n’umukino w’ishyiraniro wahuje Gasogi United na Kiyovu Sports kuri stade Mumena ukaba urangiye Gasogi United ibonye intsinzi y’igitego 1-0.
Tugiye gushaka abana bafite mpano yo gukina umupira w’amaguru, ubundi tuzabahe umwanya n’amahirwe yo kuzamura no guteza imbere impano yabo.
Biteganyijwe ko Djorkaeff agera I Kigali ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020, agatangira uruzinduko rw’ iminsi ine.
Hakizimana wabaye uwa mbere avuga ko igare yakoresheje muri iri siganwa yari yarikodesheje amafaranga ibihumbi.
Ikipe ya Rayon Sports yatangaje ko abasore bahoze bayikinira Jules Ulimwengu na Michael Sarpong bagiye kugaruka mu Rwanda bakongera bakayikinira imikino yo kwishyura ya Shampiyona.
Sadio Mane akimara gutorwa, Perezida Macky Sall wa Senegal yavuze ko Sadio Mane abaye urugero rwiza ku rubyiruko.
Sugira Ernest wari umaze iminsi 265 adatsinda igitego muri shampiyona ,agikinira APR FC yafashije Rayon Sports gutsinda Gasogi United mu mukino wari wavuzweho cyane .
Mu mwaka wa 2019 Sadio Man, Aubameyang, Mohamed Salah, na Dieumerci Mbokani batsindiye ibitego byinshi amakipe bakinamo ari nabyo bituma baza ku rutonde rw’ abakinnyi beza mu gutsinda ibitego.
Reba amafoto yaranze uyu mukino warangiye Rayon Sports iinganyije na Mukura VS 1-1.
Umukinnyi w’ inyuma wa Yanga witwa Ally Sonso niwe wariwe n’ inzuki nyinshi biba ngombwa ko abaganga bamufasha kwikuramo imbori.
Ikipe ya APR FC itsinze ikipe ya Rayon Sports mu mukino wa 90 mu myaka 25 ishize iha abafana bayo ibyishimo bikomeye bya Noheli n’ ubunani.

Igitego cyo ku munota wanyuma Rusheshangoga atsindiye APR FC gitumye yegukana amanota 3 umukino abakinnyi ba APR FC bakinaga ari 10 nyuma y’ikarita itukura .

Iki gihembo Wenger azagihabwa na Perezida George Weah wabaye umwe mu bakinnyi yatoje agikina umupira w’amaguru.
Uwo mukino wakinwe tariki 29 Nyakanga 2018, wagaragayemo ishyaka ku mpande zombi, ifirimbi ya nyuma iza kuvuga amakipe yombi afite igtego kimwe kri kimwe.

Gatera agiye gufasha Rayon Sports muri iyi mikino ya CECAFA Kagame Cup, mu mikino y’igikombe cy’Amahoro no mu mikino y’amatsinda ya CAF Confederation Cup.

Aho bivugwa ko aba bafana ba Rayon bumvikanye bakoresha imvugo n’indirimo zirimo amagambo asebya abanyamakuru ba Radio10, bivugwa kandi ko aba bafana bakoresheje n’imvugo nyandagazi zidakwiye mu muryango Nyarwanda.

Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, FERWAFA, ryahagaritse abakomiseri baryo Nshimiyimana Innocent na Niyitegeka Faraj bazira amakosa bakoze yo kutagera ku bibuga bari boherejweho n’ubuyobozi bwabo.
Gen Jean Damascene Sekamana w’imyaka 60 uherutse guhabwa ikiruhuko cy’izabukuru mu ngabo z’u Rwanda na Rurangirwa Louis wari wangiwe kwiyamamaza ubushize, nibo bemerewe kuzahatanira uyu mwanya .
Uyu mukino watangiye ahagana 18h00 waranzwe no kwihagararaho ku makipe yombi ari nabyo byatumye urangira ntan’imwe ibashije kureba mu izamu ry’indi.
Uyu mukino watangiye ahagana 18h00 nibwo umukino watangiye Rayon Sports itangira isatira mu minota 10 yambere Rayon Sports yatangiye neza ariko ntiyagira igitego ibona.
Nubwo iyi mikino imaze kwigarurira imitima ya benshi kuri iyi si, hari byinshi kuri yo abantu bataramenya birimo n’inkomoko zayo.
Uyu mukino wa 23 wa shampiyona y’igihugu y’umupira w’amaguru, wabereye kuri Sitade ya Kigali bakunda kwira Regional iherereye i Nyamirambo mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Iyi kipe ye, nta gihe kinini yari amazemo kuko yatangiye kuyikira muri Mutarama uyu mwaka.
Si ubwa mbere Real Madrid na Atletico zigiye guhurira ku mukino wa nyuma wa Champions League, kuko no mu mwaka wa 2014 zahuye, Real Madrid ikabasha gutsinda bigoranye.
Lionel Messi yavutse tariki 24 Kamena 1987, avukira mu mujyi witwa Rosario wo mu gihugu cya Argentine.
Mu yindi mikino yabaye kuri uyu wa Kabiri, harimo uwa Musanze FC yanganyije na Marines 1-1 ndetse na Rwamagana City yatsinze Sunrise FC igitego 1-0.
Twifashishije icyegeranyo cya Ruhagoyacu, turabagezaho amateka n’uduhigo twaranze imikino aya makipe yagiye akina.
Ku munota wa 31 w’umukino, Xabi Alonso yabonye igitego cya mbere icyizere cyo kwegukana intsinzi gitangira kuza ku ruhande rwa Bayern Munich.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko umwana gukunda nyina abivukana, kuko aba amaze amezi 9 ari mu nda ya nyina ariwe umurinda, amugaburira, amuha umwuka ahumeka.
Uyu mukobwa w’imyaka 22 afite agahinda k’uko agize imyaka 22 nta musore uramutereta kandi ari mwiza akaba afite n’amafaranga.
Abagore bakunda utuntu duto cyane bamwe mu bagabo badaha agaciro ari nabyo bituma abagore babaca inyuma bakarya kubishakira ku bantu basuzuguritse nk’abakozi bo mu rugo cyangwa abashoferi babo.
Gufuha si bibi ariko iyo bikabije bitera ibibazo mu rukundo ku buryo mushobora no gutandukana.
Mu mibonano mpuzabitsina umugore unyara ni ingenzi cyane, kuko umugore utanyara yandura kandi akanduza indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina mu buryo bworoshye.
Urubuga Elcrema rwakusanyije ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko igihe kigeze ugafata umwanzuro wo gutandukana n’umukunzi wawe.
Ni gake waganira n’umukobwa akakwereka ko agukunda cyangwa se yakwihebeye ahubwo asa nk’ubyirengagiza akajya abikwereka mu marenga no mu bikorwa bimwe na bimwe akora.
Niba umugabo agize atya agafungura umunwa we agiye gusoma umugore we,ururimi rwe agomba kurutosa ndetse akamusomana umutuzo adahubuka.
Habaho ibiza bene byo bagafatanya kubicyemura cyangwa bakitabaza inshuti n’imiryango bakicara basasa inzobe nuko ikibazo kigashakirwa umuti.
Ayo mashusho yafashwe ubwo uyu mugabo n’ umugore bari batumiwe mu kiganiro cyatambutse kuri Nhyira FM yo mu gihugu cya Ghana.
Umugore w’ umunyeshyari yinjiye mu cyumba cyaberagamo ubukwe avuza induru avuga ko akunda uwo musore wari umaze gusezerana.
Hari ugusomana bifatwa nko gusuhuzanya bisanzwe no gusomana bigamije gushimishanya ari nabyo bimara umwanya ugereranyije no gusomana byo gusuhuzanya.
Ese wigeze wibaza impamvu hari abakobwa bahorana mu cyumba cyabo amavuta ya Vaseline na cocombre, igisubizo cyawe ni muri iyi nkuru.
Umugabo wubatse yahimbye indi konti kuri facebook ashyiraho ifoto itari iye ateretana n’ umugore we kugeza bahanye rendez-vous bahurira muri hoteli saa mbili z’ ijoro.
Ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko muri iki gihe ikintu cyo gucana inyuma cyeze, kandi ko kigenda gifata intera haba ku ruhande rw’ abagabo no ku ruhande rw’ abagore.
Guteretana akenshi bifatwa nk’ ibintu by’ umunezero, ariko kuba uwo mukundana yarakaye cyangwa afite umunabi ntibivuga ko uwo munsi guteretana bihagarara.
Muri iyi nkuru tugiye kubagezaho impamvu eshatu zituma abakundaniye ku ishuri urukundo rwabo akenshi rurangirira ku ishuri.
Ibi bintu abagore hafi ya bose babihuriyeho kandi ntibajya babisaba kabone n’iyo yaba ari umugore usanzwe uzwiho kwisanzura ku mukunzi we.
Bamwe batereza ko urukundo ari imibereho idasanzwe, bakarushyiriraho amahame na za kirazira, ariko zimwe muri izo kirazira kuzirengaho mu buryo budakabije bituma urukundo rwanyu ruramba.
Ibyo ni ibi bikurikira Burya bitewe n’impamvu zitandukanye, hari ibintu abasore n’abagabo baba badakwiye gutindaho no kubaza cyane abakobwa n’abagore kuko badakunda kubivugishaho ukuri.
Inzobere mu by’imitekerereze n’imibanire zo zivuga ko gufuha ugakabya ari uburwayi.
Uyu musore wigaga indimi n’ubuvanganzo muri rimwe mu mashuri yo mu ntara y’ amajyepfo y’ u Rwanda yari umuhanga mu ishuri ariko akomoka mu muryango w’abatishoboye.
Mu muco nyarwanda gusomana ni umuco utari umenyerewe ariko uri kugenda ufata indi ntera cyane mu basirimu.

Umugore wakunnye aba afite umwihariko we mu gihe cy’imibonano mpuzabitsinda kimwe n’uko utavuga ko abatarakunnye bo badashimisha abagabo babo, ababikoze nibo bemeza ibyiza byabyo bitewe n’uko babibona.
Umusore ugiye gutereta bwa mbere aba afite urwikekwe kuko aba atizeye neza niba uwo agiye gusaba urukundo ari bwakire ubwo busabe .
Si abantu bakunda ibiraha no gusohokanwa ahantu hahenze niyo mpamvu n’ ibintu bakunda ku bagore usanga ari ibintu bisanzwe bitagora umugore uwo ariwe wese ufite ubushake bwo kubaka rugakomera.
Ivanka n’ umugabo we Jared Kushner bifotoje amafoto menshi ariko iyamenyekanye cyane n’ iyo bifotoreje ifoto bahagaze imbere ya tableau iri muri iyi nzu ndangamurage yitwa joconde’.
Hari ibintu byinshi bikorwa mu bukwe ukaba wakwibaza icyo bisobanuye bikakuyobera.
Umurundikazi Azama Darifa ubu ni umumiliyoneri mu buryo atari yarigeze atekereza.
Urukundo hamwe barwita ubusazi kuko hari igihe rutuma umuntu yirenga agatangira gukora ibintu bidasanzwe.
Si mu Rwanda gusa, ku Isi hose ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko gatanya zirimo kwiyongera.
Umuhanzi w’ umunyamuziki akaba n’ umuhanzi w’ umunyabugeni wamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo Erina Nakunze’ avuga ko ibivugwa muri iyi ndirimbo ariwe byabayeho.
Kugira ngo umubano wanyu urusheho kuba mwiza no kuzaba mwiza hari interuro n’ ingingo mudakwiye kubwira umugore wawe cyangwa umukobwa mukundana.
Umukozi ushinzwe umutekano w’ icumbi ry’ abakobwa biga muri imwe muri kaminuza aravuga ko abakobwa ashinzwe kurinda bagiye gutuma akazi kamunanira kubera uburyo bamugerageza bakiyambika nk’ indaya.
Umukinnyi wa Filime wo mu gihugu cya Gambia witwa Princess Shyngle yashyize ahagaragara ibyari amabanga mu rukundo rwe n’ umusore wo muri Senegal.
Dr Jen Gunter ni umuganga w’inzobere mu by’indwara zibasira abagore muri Amerika no muri Canada ufite ubunararibonye bw’imyaka 25.
Umukobwa wo muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yasutse peterole ku muhungu bakundanaga akamushumika yakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 60.
Ubwo ubu bushakashatsi bwakorwaga ngo barabafashe babaryamisha ahantu ubundi babapfuka mu maso maze ubushakashatsi bukorerwa ku bice bitandukanye by’umubiri.
Umugabo wo muri Afurika y’ Epfo uregwa guca umutwe w’ umukunzi mu kwezi kwa 4 bapfuye ikintu kitaramenyekana urubanza rwe rwimuriwe mu kwezi kwa 10.

Ibi Aptre Dr Paul Gitwaza yabigarutseho ubwo yari imbere y’imbaga y’abayoboke b’itorero Zion Temple, ubwo yarimo ababwiriza ijambo ry’Imana.

Niba uri umuzungu, Umwirabura, cyangwa undi wese, nzi neza ko wumva udafite ibyiringiro by’ivanguramoko ribera muri Amerika muri iki gihe.
Aganira na Mzazi Willy Tuva, Madamu Donna yavuze ko Jamal ari mu ikipe ye afite inshingano zo kuyobora ibintu byinshi.
Indi mbogamizi Miss Nishimwe Naomie yahuye nayo mu kwita ku bafite depression, ni uko abenshi bayifite badakunze kuvuga uko bameze mu by’ukuri ngo bafashwe kuyivamo.
Nubwo byatunguye abantu byagaragaye ko Tanasha Donna ashyigikiye Diamond Platnumz nubwo yari aheruka kugaragara avuga ko ari umuntu urangwa n’ivanguraruhu rikabije.

Mu gihe amakipe yo mu mashampiyona akomeye I Burayi akomeje kwitegura gusubukura shampiyona,abakinnyi ba FC Barcelona basuzumwe Covid-19 hanyuma 5 muri bo basanganwa iki Cyorezo gikomeje gutigisa isi yose.

Mu rwandiko rwasinyweho na CEO wa Rayon Sports,Itangishaka Bernard,Rayon Sports yabwiye Kiyovu Sports ko itubahirije amasezerano yo kugura umukinnyi ufite amasezerano mu yindi kipe ariyo mpamvu nta burenganzira imufiteho.

Ronaldo waguze ikipe ya Valladolid, yavuze ko umukinnyi akunda kureba kurusha abandi ari Lionel Messi ariko yatunguye benshi ubwo yirengagizaga kizigenza w’umunya Portugal,Cristiano Ronaldo,ukinira ikipe ya Juventus mu Butaliyani.
Uyu muraperi ukomoka mu gace ka Kayole mu gihugu cya Kenya,yerekanye ko atewe ishema rikomeye n’ibikorwa bye yagezeho.
Zilla Limann bahuriye nk’uko umugabo wa Zilla yabitangarije abanyamakuru.

Iyi foto yayiherekesheje amagambo yazamuye amarangamutima akomeye ku bakunzi be, yasezeye ku myaka ye y’ubwana y’imyaka 23 y’amavuko bituma abantu baha agaciro amagambo ye tuzuye ubwenge n’ubuhanga bwinshi.
Uyu mugabo wari ugiye kumara umwaka w’imikino ari kapiteni wa Rayon Sports,yayivuyemo yerekeza muri Police FC kubera ko ngo yari imwambuye miliyoni 7 FRW.
Habaye ibibazo byasabaga ko hatangwa umurongo ubu uwo murongo urahari ikigamijwe ni ukubaka ikipe yacu.
iyo nkuru yakwirakwiye ndetse inatungura abafana benshi b’umuziki wa Diamond Platnumz.
Beyonc nawe yasabye abamukurikira ko niba bashaka ko abari kumwe n’uwishe Floyd nabo bahanwa, basinye ku nyandiko ibisaba izwi mu rurimi rw’ icyongereza nka petition.
Davido yasabye abafana be kureka kumwita amazina ya Odogwu bakajya bamwita OBO kuko ariryo zina nawe yifuza ndetse akunda guhamarwa.
Uyu munya Portugal w’imyaka 25 yahisemo kwishumbusha iki kizungerezi kimurika imideli cyitwa Ines Tomaz bamarana iminsi yose ya Guma mu rugo mu nzu imwe gusa babanaga n’inshuti ze.
Bamwe mu bashakanye ubuzima bwarahindutse buba bwiza kuri bo, mu gihe abandi bwababereye ukundi abadashoboye kwihanganira bagahitamo gutandukana.
Nakabaye meze nk’umugore wabyaye abana batanu ariko ikimero cyane kiryoshye nk’icy’uburanga bw’umwana w’imyaka 16, aya ni amagambo ya Zari Hassan witakaga ubwiza bwe.

Eliane Niyonagira yavuze ko yifashishije amakuru yagiye atangazwa kuri Safi Madiba mu kwigisha ku byerekeye amarangamutima gusa uyu muhanzi wibereye muri Canada yavuze ko yabifashe nko kumusebya ahitamo kumurega.
Kemi Olinloyo yavuze ko nubwo yasaba imbabazi kubyo yakoze atamubarira gusa amagambo yateje urujijo kuko atigeze asobanura icyo bapfa ahubwo akerekana ko arajwe inshinga no kumushyira ku karubanda.
Mu myenda ya siporo igaragaza imiterere ye, Georgina Rodriguez yagaragaje ko akunda siporo cyane ko n’umukunzi we Ronaldo ayikunda cyane.
Swift avuga ko Trump yita inkozi z’ibibi abigaragambya bamagana umupolisi w’Umuzungu wishe Umwirabura amuheheje umwuka, ngo ni ukudashyira mu gaciro.

Naratunguwe, nabibonye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mbanza kugira ngo ni bimwe byaho, nyuma natunguwe no kubibona mu bitangazamakuru nizeraga ko ari iby’umwuga.
Amakuru acaracara aravuga ko uko kwezi Rayon Sports yahawe kugiye gushira itarishyura kuburyo uyu mugabo wo muri Mexico bityo FIFA ishobora kongeraho ibihano kuri Rayon Sports.
Yagize ati Munyakazi Sadate ni we uhagarariye Rayon Sports mu mategeko, abandi ntibemewe.
Ninde urenze muri bo bombi Yagize atiImbuga nkuranyambaga zo muri Tanzania zamvuze mu rukundo na Diamond ku bw’ifoto yasakaye yanjye.
InstagramMartin Promoter FacebookMunezero Martin Twitter Martin Promoter.
Imbwa zahoze ari inshuti magara y’umugabo, ariko kuri ubu bigaragara ko zishobora no kuba inshuti y’umugore, binarenze inshuti nziza yo kuryamana no gusinzira umugore nkuko bigaragara hano.
Aya mafilimi y’uruhererekane yakunzwe na benshi ni nayo Nkusi Thomas wamenyekanye nka Yanga yakunze cyane muyo yasobanuye yose gusa yavuze ko atakwibuka filimi zose yasobanuye kuko ari nyinshi cyane.
Real Madrid ikura agaciro kayo ku bikombe yatwaye bikomeye ndetse n’imbaraga ifite mu bucuruzi cyane ko kuri ubu yazamuye urwunguko rwayo mu bucuruzi rugera kuri 40.
Murakoze icyo nakora nukubasabira imigisha kuri Allah ibibazo ikipe irimo bikazashira.

Umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari abayobozi ba Rayon Sports barimo abigeze kuyiyobora n’uyiyobora ubu batumijweho mu iperereza ryatangiye nubwo yirinze kuvuga amazina y’abahamagajwe.

Zahara ntiyagize icyo avuga ku magambo ya Anne Kansiime,gusa abafana ba Anne Kansiime basa nk’abamuvugiye kuko basabye ko yajya yoroshya amagambo agenda avuga mu bintu bitandukanye birimo n’imyambarire y’abanyamakuru.
Inkuru y’urupfu rw’uyu mugabo wamamaye cyane muri filime Nous irons tous au paradis’ yamenyekanye ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu mugoroba ku wa 28 Gicurasi 2020.
Aya makimbirane y’aba bahanzi yatangiye ubwo Davido yamenyeshaga umushinga w’indirimbo yateguraga gushyira hanze mu ntangiriro z’ukwezi kwa Nyakanga maze bituma batangira guhangana.
Hari benshi bahise batwara uyu muhanzikazi muri ubwo buryo bamufata nk’uwihata kuvuga icyongereza nyamara cyo nticyimubanire.
Amakipe yose uko ari 20 akina Premier League yemeye gusubukura imyitozo mu minsi ishize ariko ku munsi w’ejo nibwo yemeye ko hakorwa imyitozo yo gukoranaho kw’abakinnyi muri rusange.
Muraho mwese, nitwa Princess Tiffah.
Rutanga wari usigaranye amasezerano y’umwaka 1 muri Rayon Sports,yahisemo guhita ayasesa cyane ko iyi kipe yari itaramwishyura akayabo ka miliyoni 7 yari imurimo.

Uyu mukinnyi akurikiranyweho kunyereza imisoro nyuma ya bagenzi be Lionel Messi, Neymar .
Rayon Sports muri shampiyona iri ku mwanya wa mbere n’amanota 13 mu gihe Bugesera FC iri ku mwanya wa 8 n’amanota 8.
Ku munsi w’ejo tariki 22 Ugushyingo 2016 nibwo umuryango wa Ishimwe Clement na Butera Jean D’Arc Knowless bibarutse umwana w’umukobwa.
Uyu musore ukina imbere nka rutahizamu nyuma y’imyitozo we n’umuhagarariye bahise bajya gusinya amasezerano n’ikipe ya Rayon Sports ngo ayikinire imyaka ibiri.
Kuri ubu u Rwanda rwicaye ku mwanya wa 101 mu gihe mu kwezi gushize rwari ku mwanya wa 107.
Oumar Sidibe n’umwe mu bakinnyi bagaragaje ubuhanga mu mwaka w’imikino ushize by’umwihariko mu gutanga imipira ivamo ibitego no kubitsinda.
Kayitare Wayitare Dembe abicishije ku mbuga ze nkoranyambaga akaba yagaragaraje uburyo yishimiye uyu mushinga wa Shaddy Boo yise ’Love On The Plate’ mu kinyarwanda bivuze ngo ’Urukundo ku isahani’.

Mu kiganiro na NBS, Madamu Donna yatangaje ko Platnumz yananiwe kwigaragaza ku munota wa nyuma kubera ko atigeze ahembwa kugira ngo abone kwitabira ibyo birori.
Abakinnyi bazandikishwa mu cyiciro cya kabiri bemerewe gusa gutangira gukina uhereye muri 116 cy’irushanwa.
Wesley Sneijder yavuze ko yakagombye kuba yarabaye nka Messi na Ronaldo mu mupira w’amaguru ariko ngo yagize ikibazo cyo kutabyiyumvamokuko ngo atigeze yifuza kureka inzoga.

Uku kubura umwanya kwa Zaha kwakuruye ibihuha ku mbuga nkoranyambaga aho bamwe bavuze ko byatewe n’uko akimara kugera muri Manchester United yatangiye gukururana n’umutoza wayo David Moyes ndetse banaryamana.
Ati Guitar niyo yamperekeje mu bihe bikomeye by’agahinda, igahinda agahinda kari kanteye.
Yanze gukomeza kubihisha yemeza ko nyuma yo gutandukana na Meddy Saleh babyaranye abana babiri afite undi mugabo uba mu mahanga ndetse bitegura gukora ubukwe.
Miss Mwiseneza Josiane yabwiye Star Magazine ko umusore witwa Evazoo Evazoo biga muri Kaminuza imwe wahamije ko bakundana nta rukundo ruri hagati ye nawe.

Muri Nyakanga umwaka ushize,nibwo ikipe ya Rayon Sports yumvikanye na myugariro Rugwiro Herve washyize umukono ku masezerano y’imyaka 2 ari umukinnyi wayo.
Umugore wa Aleksandar Katai witwa Tea yasabye inzego zishinzwe umutekano ko zica abo yise umwanda mu butumwa yanyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Uyu Rukundo Fred yatawe muri yombi mu ntangiriro z’iki cyumweru hamwe n’abandi babiri barimo uhagarariye urubyiruko muri aka Kagari ndetse n’umukozi wakoraga isuku ku Kagari.
Kuwa 28 Gicurasi 2020,nibwo Umunyamabanga mukuru wa Rayon Sports, Abraham Kelly wari umaze amezi 5 gusa atorewe uwo mwanya yeguye ku mirimo ye.
Nkuko yabinyujije mu butumwa yanyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ze,Kakule Mugheni Fabrice yasezeye ku bakunzi ba Rayon Sports ndetse ababwira ko gutandukana nabo aricyo kintu kimugoye cyane.
Modric yavuze ko kizigenza Cristiano Ronaldo na Jose Mourinho bari bagiye kurwanira mu rwambariro nyuma y’aho uyu mutoza yatutse uyu rutahizamu amuziza ko atagiye gufasha ubwugarizi.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 05 Kamena 2020, Komisiyo y’Ubujurire muri FERWAFA yateranye yiga ku bujurire bwa Gicumbi F.

Gianna Floyd ufite imyaka itandatu,Papa yahinduye isi.
FERWAFA yatangaje ko ibyemezo byafashwe hashingiwe ku bubasha Komite Nyobozi yayo ihabwa n’ingingo ya 33 muri sitati amategeko shingiro ya FERWAFA n’ingingo ya 28 mu mategeko ngengamikorere yayo.

Tariki ya 14 Gashyantare 2018 ni bwo Diamond Platnumz na Zari bari basanzwe babana nk’umugabo n’umugore batandukanye bashinjanya ubusambanyi,nyuma y’aho Zari yakunze kujya ashinja Diamond kutita ku bana be.
Ronaldo ageze ikirenge mu cya Floyd Mayweather wahoze akina iteramakofe na Tiger Woods ukina Golf nabo batunze miliyari.
Mu byagarutsweho harimo kurebera hamwe amarushanwa yari ahari imbere mu gihugu n’ingaruka yagizweho na Coronavirus.

Mu kiganiro aherutse kugira, umuririmbyi wa Zoea Mawe, Ringtone Apoko, yavuze ko atashakaga kurongora Zari ahubwo ko yashakaga kumutera inkunga no kumushyigikiragusa, akaba yarashinjaga itangazamakuru gusobanura nabi ibyo yandikaga.

Mu butumwa yashyize kuri Twitter ye Makwarela yagize ati byose byatangiye muri 2016,ubu tumaze imyaka 4 turi kumwe.
Usengimana w’imyaka 25 yatangiye gukundana na Daniella mu 2009, urukundo rwabo rurakura cyane none nyuma y’imyaka 10 beretse inshuti n’abavandimwe ibirori.
Kuwa gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize ni bwo uyu myugariro wakiniye amakipe arimo Rayon Sports na APR FC ndetse n’ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi, yasabye anakwa Bayingana bari bamaze igihe kinini bakundana.
Bumwe mu buryo umusore akoresha asaba umukobwa kwemera ko bazabana nk’umugabo n’umugore ni umuhango umusore akora akazana impeta agatera ivi agasaba umukobwa kuzamubera umugore.

Umunya-Mali Oumar Sib w’imyaka 30 ukina inyuma ya ba rutahizamu yagizwe Visi kapiteni wa Rayon Sports asimbura Irambona Eric uherutse kwerekeza muri Kiyovu SC.
Rayon Sports kuri Twitter yabihakanye, ivuga ko ukeneye uyu mukinnyi yayisanga bakavugana.
Amakuru twahawe n’umwe mu bayobozi ba Sunrise FC utashatse ko amazina ye tuyatangaza yabwiye UMUSEKE ko baguze uyu mukinnyi kugira ngo bagire abakinnyi bakuru mu bwugarizi bw’iyi kipe.
Tariki ya 28 Gicurasi 2020 ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports bwakiriye ibaruwa y’Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’ikipe, Abraham Kelly avuga ko asezeye ku nshingano ze kubera impamvu ze bwite.
Rugwiro yigeze kuba Kapiteni wungirije muri APR FC, wasimburaga Mugiraneza Migi’.
Abinyujije kuri Instagram, Mugheni Fabrice yanditse amagambo yo gusezera ku ikipe ya Rayon Sports ndetse n’abafana bayo.
Iriya Komisiyo ngo yasanze impamvu zatanzwe n’ariya makipe ku bujurire bwayo zidafite ishingiro bityo ko zikwiye kwemera icyemezo cyo kumanuka.
Ni inama iteganyijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu ku isaha ya saa kumi n’ebyiri 18h00’, iza kuba hifashijwe ikoranabunga rya Webex.
Rivuga ko guhera ku wa Mbere taliki 08, Kamena, 2020, abakina umukino w’amagare bemerewe gukora imyitozo.
Amakuru twahawe n’umwe mu bayobozi ba Kiyovu SC avuga ko ibiganiro na Ntwari Evode bigeze ku musozo kandi bizeye ko ari businyire kuzakina mu ikipe yabo.
Ngendahimana Eric akina kuri nomero 6 mu kibuga, avuga ko Kiyovu yamuhaye ibiruta ibyo Police FC yamuhaga bituma ayitera umugongo.
Ati Umunsi wa mbere nkina muri Sunrise FC, ni bwo nabonye intangiriyo y’ubuzima, ntangira kumva ko nshobora kuzagera ku nzozi zange zo gukinira ikipe y’igihugu.
Kimenyi Yves wari umaze umwaka ari umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports, yasinyiye gukinira Kiyovu SC imyaka ibiri.
Aganira na UMUSEKE ushinzwe ku mushakira amakipe witwa Nduwayezu Emmy yavuze ko Kawunga yamaze gushyira umukono ku masezerano y’imyaka ibiri muri Sunrise FC.
Yavuze ko abafana nk’aba Rayon, Arsenal, real Madrid ari urugero rwiza.
Hashize igihe mu miyoborere ya Rayon Sports havugwamo ibibazo.
Nta gihe kinini gishize bivugwa ko yasinye na Kiyovu ariko yaba we cyangwa abayobozi ba Kiyovu bakabihakana.
Rwemeje ko Sadate ari we wemewe n’amategeko, bityo ni we uyihagarariye.
Tumubakijije niba ntayindi kipe batangiye ibiganiro yatubwiye ko hari amakipe menshi, ku isonga Rayon Sports ikaba iri mu zishobora kurara zimusinyishije.
Amakuri yizewe dufite dukesha uvuye kuri Agent, ni uko uriya mukinnyi yamaze kwerekwa APR FC kandi ikamushima, igisigaye ngo ni ugushyira umukono ku masezerano.
Marie Michelle UMUHOZA yabwiye Umuseke ati Hari abantu bo muri Rayon Sports bahamagawe mu rwego rw’Iperereza, hahamagajwe abaregwa n’abarega, Munyakazi Sadate ni we wareze.
Avuga ko ubuyobozi buri ho muri iki gihe bwagombye kwegera ubwo bwasimbuye bakaganira, bakarebera hamwe isooko y’ibibazo biri mu ikipe bityo bigakemurwa.
Yari amaze igihe kigera ku myaka itatu akinira Rayon Sports akaba yari mwuganiriro ukina ku ruhande rw’ibumoso.
Abaye uwa kabiri weguye nyuma ya Jean Paul Nkurunziza wari umuvugizi w’iyi kipe iri kuvugwamo ibibazo muri iyi minsi.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 27 Gicurasi 2020, Rugwiro Herv yageze kuri imwe muri hoteli y’i Kigali ari kumwe n’Umunyamakuru ukorera Radio mu Rwanda.

Kubera ibibazo byinshi bishingiye ku mikoro biri mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports, Muhawenimana Claude uyobora abafana na Runigababisha Mike uyobora ihuriro ry’amatsinda y’abafana b’iyi kipe basabye Munyakazi Sadate kwegura.
Ni umukinnyi wa kabiri wa Rayon ugiye muri Kiyovu Sports nyuma ya Irambona Eric, ndetse ngo hari n’abandi bivugwa ko bashobora gukurikira aba.
Ibi bikaba byemejwe n’umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza mu kiganiro yagiranye na The New Times.
Kuri Twitter ya Musanze FC bamaze kwemeza ko Seniga Innocent ari umutoza mukuru w’iyi kipe.
Itangazo rigenewe Abanyamakuru ryasinyweho n’Umuyobozi mukuru w’umuryango wa Rayon Sports, Ngarambe Charles, rivuga ko komite yariho yahagaritswe.
Ubu busabane bwanitabiriwe kandi na Perezida wa APR FC akaba n’umugenzuzi mukuru wa RDF, Lt Gen.

Abanyarwanda bo hambere bavugaga ko iyo umuntu apfuye, umubiri uba umurambo, igicucu kikaba umuzimu utagaragara kandi udafatika.
Iyo miterere y’inkomoko y’abami ikavuga ko umwami iyo yatangaga yagombaga gusimburwa n’umuhungu we, bityo bityo kugeza ku ndunduro.
Buri gihugu cyagiraga amatwara yacyo ashingiye ku kubumbatira ubusugire bw’igihugu n’abaturage bacyo, bityo ugasanga ibihugu byose bihora birwana ishyaka ryo gutsinda amahanga bihana imbibi.
Ageze mu nzira, abona inyoni yafashwe n’umushibuka iruhande rw’ikirundo cy’ibyatsi byumye.
Perezida wa Repubulika yunamiye intwari z’u Rwanda, anashyira indabo ku kimenyetso cy’ubutwari.
Ikibazo abayirokotse bemeza bafite ni ihakana n’ipfobya rya Jenoside ndetse ni uburyo abayirokotse bagifitiwe urwango ndetse rugaragara henshi ku isi.
Andi moko yabonekaga mu Rwanda yari ay’inzu aho umuntu yabyaraga, abamukomokaho bakamwitirirwa kugeza ku buzukuruza,ubuvivi n’ubuvivure, aho twavuga nk’Abahindiro bakomoka kuri Gahindiro.
